title: Amazing staying
text: Location is great. Stuff is very friendly. And rooms is bid for NY standards. Rooms have kitchen, laundry at 0 floor and gym. Really great concept  and implementation for monthly rental. I think if you need monthly rental it’s much better then some rbnb flats. Cause they change bed sets and towels. For this price all excellent 👍👍👍

title: Very good experience
text:
The residence is well located, in a quiet area where stores are close and numerous to satisfy all your purchases.
The entrance hall is well laid out and offers tourist brochures to occupy the day in New York with a space to relax in peace.
The Dormans are always present, pleasant and competent with 24/7 video surveillance throughout the building, in common areas. It's very reassuring, especially with children.
No one can pass beyond the entrance without making themselves known to the Dormans.
The residence is equipped with a technical room for washing and drying paid laundry in the basement, which is very practical for a long stay. There is also a free gym in the basement.
The rooms are well appointed and well equipped. The bathrooms are functional. The kitchens are well equipped for trouble-free cooking.
The day rooms have sufficient surface area to spend the necessary time there.
There is a television and free wifi.
A complete cleaning service is carried out once a week with change of bathroom linen and sheets.
Thank you to the entire team of speakers during our stay.

title: A Comfortable Stay~@^_^@~
text: I ordered a studio in the beginning of March. Everything is so good! Compared to a dormitory room of university, I love the fully functional kitchen with all items I need. It’s a lovely building and staffs are very friendly. I’ll definitely come back next time!

title: Excellent place
text: Very very comfortable beds. King size. Staff has always been excellent, very helpful, always pleasant and smiling and very professional. I always felt safe. Someone was always at the reception desk and accepts and holds your packages for you. Staff always cleaning. Elevators were fast. Here on business for several months. Bonus for great black out curtains and a basic gym.

title: Review
text:
Super friendly and helpful staff - great location for mid-town east
walking distance to grand central which is great, and a lot of supermarkets in the area also walking distance.

price is reasonable depending on the season, the only down side though is that they don't do "deep cleaning"

title: Great Stay in Prime Location
text: This is our second trip with a long term stay, and we are having a wonderful time! Staff is very friendly, and always responsive when we asked for something. Building and rooms are clean and well-managed, and you can’t beat prime location. We will be back!

title: Spacious apartment and nice staff
text: Murray Hill East Suites is a gem of an extended stay hotel. The location can't be beat and the staff is helpful and friendly. The one bedroom apartment is good-sized and the kitchen large by NYC standards. Will definitely return.

title: Highly recommend
text: Lovely place with lovely people. We checked in here at the end of August and didn’t want to leave! Stayed almost until Christmas! Beautiful decor nice and comfortable spacious rooms with great service. Location and value unbeatable

title: The Murray Hill East is the Best!
text: The Murray Hill East is my place to stay whenever I'm in New York. They have the most attentive Front Desk and Housekeeping staff you can find. The rooms are spacious and spotless. It's conveniently located in midtown and close to NYU Langone Hospital where I go for treatment. I wouldn't stay anywhere else.

title: GREAT PLACE FOR A MONTH STAY IN NYC
text: The beds are very comfortable,  front desk staff very helpful. Neighborhood is filled with restaurants and cross town bus and subway is three blocks away. Have been there two years and have reserved for the Fall of 2024. Good value

title: Great place to stay
text: Great place to stay.  My son started working in NYC and needed a place to stay.  Has been there since September 2023 and it's safe, clean, and the people take care of you.  The location is in the middle of everything and I highly recommend to anyone looking to stay in NYC for 30 days or more.  Also, Stanley has been exceptional in helping us with everything.

title: I‘ll come back
text:
phenomenal location, great place, great value for money
The rooms are large, the bed is comfortable and the pillows are very good. It is very practical that there is a kitchen. You can make great trips to Central Park and downtown on foot. A great place to start subway rides as Grand Central is right around the corner

title: Wonderful
text: Very clean rooms, good wifi connection and very supportive front desk and staff. Amazing kitchen equipments. Comfortable towels and bed sheets. Pillows felt very comfortable and easy to adapt. Some sofas look slightly old and outdated but still they were very comfortable and cozy.

title: Great Midtown Manhattan Location!
text:
Fantastic location and clean, comfortable and quiet rooms.  Well appointed kitchen.
Very friendly front-desk personnel (desk staffed 24 hours so very safe building).  Houskeeping is very good.  Minutes from Grand Central and all of mid-town; you can walk everywhere.  This was my second 1-month stay and I look forward to returning!

title: Very nice place in New york
text: I had a happy time in a really beautiful accommodation in Midtown New York. There are Starbucks, marts, and Shack Shack near the accommodation, and it's the best location to walk through most of New York's attractions. The host Stanley and other staff have been kind and warm to us throughout our stay. There was even a small kitchen, so it was good to make simple food, and I had a happy time here because it was located in a safe place. Thank you.

title: Very good place to stay
text:
Murray Hill East Suites is a very good place to stay. The place is clean, nice and in a very good location. The staff is very friendly and ready to help. The front desk staff in particular are very nice and ready to answer any question any time of the day. 
I would recommend staying in this place and benefiting from the hospitality of the staff.

title: Funny experience in new York city in october 2023
text: The hotel is located near my work and other places of interest. The friendly staff and very willing to help. The rooms are spacious and the staff cleans them once a week or when you ask. It is expensive depending on the month. October was a month in which the rate does not go down from 200 dollars and in November it goes down to 130.Nevertheless it was a good and funny experience in new York.

title: Comfy and great location
text:
Location is fantastic if you need to stay near the UNHQ, and has easy access to places like Bryant Park and restaurants. 
The staff is very helpful and always available, very professional.
Its a affordable place.

title: A Divine Time at Murray Hill East Suites
text:
I had a divine time at Murray Hill East Suites. 

My apartment was just like the pictures ~ and even better. It was spacious and clean, and I thoroughly enjoyed having access to a business center, laundry room, and gym all in the building. 

The location is excellent with a plethora of diverse restaurants and NYC activities within walking distance. And anything else I desired to see or do was easily accessible by bus, subway, and/or Uber/taxi. 

And the entire staff ~ from Stanley to Janis to Josephine ~ were all amazing. They were so kind, communicative, and proactive.

I am most grateful for my stay, and would (and will) definitely stay again in the future.

Thank you Murray Hill East Suites🥰

title: Great living at Murray Hill East Suites. - conveniently located in Midtown
text:
I was working on a project and stayed at Murray Hill East Suites for several months. Conveniently located in Midtown and stress free. Great friendly staff and always available to assist you. Neat and clean apartment. The building has the laundry facility and a small gym with clean towel available.  Easy car parking. 
Again The staff at the Murray Hill East Suites is very friendly and attentive and that made the stay very comfortable. I will always choose this place and recommend this place to anyone.

title: I recommend this place, gladly.
text:
The place is comfortable and spacious. Everything I required was there: laundry, desk, Wi-Fi, equipped kitchen, equipped bathroom and living and dining space to rest and be comfy. The hotel is very well-located and has an elevator, gym and heater. However, the best thing about this place is its concierge team; they are the best: charming, helpful and trustworthy.
I’ve been here three times already, so I recommend it, gladly.

title: Murray Hill East Suites, a great place to stay.
text: I  have stayed twice at the Murray Hill East and both stays were fantastic. From the Front Desk to the Housekeeping and Maintenance staff, they all make you feel at home, especially Stanley and Ray, one of whom is almost always at the front desk. The rooms are spacious and come with kitchens, perfect for longer stays. There's a small gym and coin laundry in the basement, and the wifi is excellent. This is my home away from home in New York. Will return in the near future.

title: Very good location, Great for extended, self catering stay
text: the hotel is very conveniently located, with 5 minutes walk to the Grand Central Station and 10 minutes walk to UN Headquarters. It offered long term self catering accommodations, from studio to two bedroom, with full size fridge, cooking stoves, dish washer etc, with coin operated laundry in the basement. It offers good value for money if you are looking for some place for extended stay. The front desk can receive mails and parcels for your room, so it you can order things on line, too.

title: Great choice!
text:
The perfect Choice for my 1 month long stay. 
Great location & great staff.

The rooms are good and have pretty much everything you need.
Would definitely recommend.
You also find a great Bagel store  and grocery store not far away from Murray Hill East Suites,

title: I had a great time at the Murray Hill East Suites.
text:
I had a great time at the Murray Hill East Suites.
I stayed there with my husband for a month and we liked everything. Our apartment was very good. We liked the bedroom, living room and kitchen as well as the huge balcony with amazing views of the Empire State building and the city. 
The staff at the Murray Hill East Suites is very friendly and attentive. We were given clean bed linen and towels every week. The building also has laundry facilities for extra charge (6$ for washing and drying). 
The location of the Murray Hill East Suites is perfect as well.

title: Excellent hotel
text:
Very welcoming staff excellent location grocery store in the corner everything was within walking distance time square is few blocks away a very spacious room and washing machines available and fitness room available in the ground floor
Price is very reasonable compared to the rest of the hotels I will definitely choose it in my future trips

title: Great option for college students living in NYC for the summer
text: Our college aged son lived here for 2 months over the summer. It was a perfect set up -  great location and very close to mass transit, clean and well kept units, wi-fi and all utilities are included, the doormen are great and there 24 hours. The rooms were quiet. Fresh towels and sheets are available at all times. The units are cleaned monthly for free or for a small additional fee you can add on additional cleanings. I felt very comfortable having my son living here. Would definitely use Murray Hill East Suites again.

title: Great experience at Murray Hill East Suites this summer
text: My sister and two cousins stayed at Murray Hill East Suites from June 1st through early August while we pursued a summer internship in NYC. The experience was excellent! The staff was very nice and helpful with all our needs. The facilities are in great condition and the location in midtown NYC is perfect. I will highly recommend anyone to stay at Murray Hill East Suites and look forward to our next stay.

title: Friendly & clean in a safe & convenient area
text: Murray Hill Suites is located in a convenient & safe area. The staff is very friendly and accommodating. The hotel is clean and bright. I am spending the summer of 2023 here. As a former NYC resident living in Miami I will make Murray Hill Suites my goto place when I visit friends & family.

title: Highly recommended! The perfect choice for long stays!
text:
Excellent location, very close to Grand Central/UN. 
Rooms are spacious, ideal for long stays: kitchenette, TV, comfortable beds, extra room for desk, dining table. 
Staff is friendly, very helpful.

title: Friendly staff, centrally located, clean and comfortable rooms
text:
Great stay at the suites; incredibly thoughtful and accommodating staff, clean and well-equipped rooms, and centrally located in Manhattan. 

The highlight is how nice and friendly everyone working there is. They really made me feel welcome and made sure I had a comfortable stay. Any time there was an issue, it was quickly and seamlessly addressed. 

If you are looking to stay in New York for an extended amount of time, I would highly recommend this building; it has made my stay in New York very enjoyable.

title: Murray Hill Suites Summer Stay
text: The doormen/women were incredibly friendly and accommodating. Great location with good restaurants within east walking distance. Overall, Murray Hill Suites is a great spot and would recommend to anyone looking to spend either one night or many in the city.

title: Great Accommodations For Extended Stays
text:
* Clean and spacious units with a full kitchen including plates, pots, pans, toaster, and everything else you need.
* Very comfortable mattresses with pillows that provide the perfect support.
* Friendly staff that was very responsive to all needs. 
* Great location.
* Overall, best alternative for extended stays in NYC.  Far better than sublet, etc. We would definitely stay there again.

title: A Perfect Home Away from Home
text:
I have been staying at Murray Hill East Suites for the last several years, several times per year. The property is an excellent choice for long-term stays, providing a comfortable and welcoming environment that truly feels like a home away from home.

The staff at Murray Hill East Suites are friendly, attentive, and always available to assist with requests or questions. The suites are spacious, clean and cozy.
 
Considering the spaciousness of the suite, the convenient location, and the exceptional service, Murray Hill East Suites provides outstanding value for money.

title: Best place to stay in Manhattan
text: Murray Hill East Suites is the best location in the heart of Manhattan where stay for holidays as well as business. In a few steps you can reach the most iconic and famous place as Grand Central, Bryant Park, Time square, Chrysler and Empire State Building. Rooms are comfortable, cleaned, wide but mostly have a kitchen. All staff is gentle and hopeful. Bedlinen and towels are changed weekly. Laundry and gym facilities are located in the ground floor. All around the Hotel there are a plenty of restaurants and groceries where find whatever you need. I really suggest it.

title: Excellent
text: I stayed there for one month with a friend, the room was really nice and the staff was friendly and helpful. It is also well located with a grocery store and a metro station nearby. I would definitely recommend this place !

title: An Economical and Convenient Base for an Extended NYC Trip
text:
The staff here are wonderful - friendly and helpful. You'll find linens, kitchen and household items, and anything else you might need readily available. If you want to live like a local while you're visiting New York but still have the option for hotel service, Murray Hill East Suites provide the balance. You're mere steps away from a variety of dining, entertainment and shopping options. Not to mention Grand Central Station and a major Subway hub if you're looking to venture further across the city or beyond.

Best of all, compared to typical room rates, you can spend more on experiencing New York with what you'll save over a hotel.

title: Great host.  Clean and spacious room.
text: Stayed here for 5 weeks on a business trip.  Stanley was a great host, he was accommodating to any requests I had.  Staff were very friendly as well.  The room was clean and spacious.  Would definitely stay again.

title: Great, comfortable hotel.
text: We had a very pleasant stay at this hotel.  Staff are very friendly and accommodating to our needs.  The rooms are warm and inviting.  The hotel is in a very convenient location in East midtown.  We were able to easily access Grand Central and fifth Ave for shopping.

title: Frequent traveler to NY
text: I travel twice a year to NY and I can say that the location is very good, close to all points of interest, the service of the staff in general is outstanding (Ray, Janice, Stanley, Dorotha, Josephine, Halina and Marion), always ready to solve any issue or requirement of the traveler.

title: The Best in New York
text: 45 days of pure well-being, splendid hotel in an amazing location.  Very kind staff, the best of all is Ray, an honest and sincere person, a real pleasure to talk to him!  I felt at home and I found everything so perfect!  i can't wait to return to this beautiful hotel

title: We will be back.
text: Ray and Al are very helpful at the front desk. The kitchens are spacious.  Elevators are quiet.  We also loved the location being it is quiet yet close to lots of amenities. We felt at home staying here.

title: Extended Stay
text:
My family and I ended up having to stay in NYC unexepectedly and stayed at Murray Hill Suites.  We were there month to month for five months.  We had a one bedroom apartment with a spacious bedroom, living room and closets.  Full kitchen with micowave, stove/oven, refrigerator and coffee maker. Comfortable beds and furniture. Linens and towels provided. 
Building has two elevators, Laundry room, 24 hour  front desk service (packages and mail can be delivered).
During our unexpected stay we found all the staff to be highly attentive and caring.  Issues were addressed immediatley.  We were touched by the level of kindness we were shown by everyone.  It was our home away from home. Employees always went above and beyond. 
Walking distance to pharamcies, stores (Trader Joe's) and restauraunts. 
We would stay there again.

title: Great place!
text:
We have been going to Murray Hill Suites for the past 20 years, every year for an entire month. This shows how much my wife and I like this place.  Going there makes us feel at home every time we go. 
The suites are very comfortable, clean and spacious; the personnel is always extremely available and cordial. 
I would recommend it to anyone, and have already sent many of our friends who have always been very happy with our suggestion. 
I can't wait to go again next week. 
Giovanni and Mary Crisafulli

title: Murray Hill East Suites - our home from home for almost 4 months.
text:
My wife and used the Murray Hill East Suites for a total of 15 weeks as we were having work done in our apartment.

Murray Hill East turned out to be a great choice. We opted for a one bedroomed apartment and were very happy with it. It was a 5 minute walk to our own place so ideally situated.

The team at Murray Hill East were all very good. From front desk team to the handy man and maids, all were very happy to help and sort small issues out.  The rooms were pleasantly large and very comfortable. It also is surprisingly quiet at night.

The kitchen was adequate but could have done with a couple or more pots ( I like to cook) so I did bring a couple with us though just in case!

I would heartily recommend Murry Hill East Suites for an extended stay. It was perfect for us.

It would be ideal for families as it also has a good laundry.

title: Very Happy Guest!
text:
This was the fourth time I stayed at this hotel and I have recommended it to every person I know that was traveling to NYC and they were happy with my selection.  I was staying there for business for 42 days.  The rooms I stayed in were clean, quiet and comfortable.  If I needed anything, the friendly staff was very attentive and helped me quickly.  
The hotel was located only minutes walking distance from Grand Central Terminal which was important for my work.  There were lots of restaurants very close to the hotel which was good thing after a long day at work.  I will return to NYC this Christmas season and once again I will book a room here without any hesitation.  PS - I am not a family member and have NO affiliation with this establishment other than being a very satisfied guest!

title: A New York City gem
text: Murray Hill East is genuinely New York City. The location is excellent (next to Grand Central terminal with all public transportation options). It’s also clean & well-kept, the staff is helpfull & friendly. Best of all is that both the staff & the guests come from all over the world - hence you get that specific New York cosmopolitan feeling. Murray Hill East feels like home away from home. It's genuin, welcoming, well-kept & very international

title: Cozy home away from home
text:
I rate this accommodation five stars on all counts. Let me start with location. It is great location within Manhattan and has great connectivity across New York. So it is the best location for holiday as well as business. It is a safe area. There are lot of vegan and other food options including Indian food in close vicinity. 
Staff is super cooperative and helpful. Full marks on that count. 
Rooms are clean, specious with kitchen and toilet. Laundry facilities are available in ground floor which is very useful. 
Gym and business centre make stay more comfortable and enjoyable. I became so comfortable, I extended my stay here. I Highly recommended this place.

title: Bedbug infestation
text:
Realized relatively quickly in my stay that I was getting bedbug bites, and noticed fecal stains (bedbug excrement) on the sheets as well. Reported it to the staff, and was met with skepticism. The cleaning lady literally told me that if there were no blood stains, there were no bedbugs. I almost started to doubt myself.

I then woke up one night and caught an actual bedbug nymph, engorged with my blood (🤮). I brought it to the hotel staff in the morning and stated that it was a baby bedbug. They sent the cleaning staff (after I had to ask a second time 😞), and the lady insisted that there were no bedbugs. Even after I showed her photos of what an engorged nymph looks like, she was adamant that the bug did not look like that. When I asked whether she still had it so that we could show it to a pest control specialist, she told me that she *threw the bedbug away*.

It was at this point that they had zero interest in helping me and simply wanted to gaslight me and cover it up. I proceeded to replace my luggage, launder my clothing, and leave early. To be honest, this is the most vile and self-serving behavior I've ever encountered from hotel staff in my life. I shudder to imagine how widespread this problem might be if their policy is to pretend there's no issue.

title: "Excellent Stay at Murray Hill East Suites - Perfect Location and Great Staff"
text:
I had a great stay at Murray Hill East Suites during my business trip. One of the standout features of Murray Hill East Suites is its location. With easy access to Grand Central Terminal, the Empire State Building, it's an excellent base for exploring New York City. Additionally, there are plenty of dining and grocery options nearby, making it easy to find whatever you need during your stay.

Stanley and Ray who owned the place went above and beyond to ensure that my stay was comfortable and enjoyable. The staff members go out of their way to accommodate guest requests, and takes customer service seriously.

Overall, I would highly recommend Murray Hill East Suites to anyone looking for a comfortable and convenient place to stay in New York City. With its excellent location, great amenities, and nice staff, it's a top choice for both business and leisure travelers.

Parwez

title: Great location. Exceptional service. Great value for money!
text:
This place is awesome! Great value for money, excellent location - just minutes walk from the tourist spots like Bryant Park, 5th Avenue, Times Square, you name it! Extremely friendly & accommodating staff who will go all out to make your stay very pleasant. 

Lots of restaurants and grocery stores within the vicinity. A 24-hour CVS is just a few blocks away. Transportation is a breeze with the subway and Grand Central just a few blocks away. 

Let's put it this way. I booked a room in October 2020 during the pandemic and planned to stay for a month. I ended up staying for over 2 years. That's how good it is!

title: Perfect for short/long term stays, great location and wonderful staff!
text:
Murray Hill East is conveniently located, fully furnished with all the amenities I need, and managed by a warm, friendly and responsive front desk and housekeeping staff. 

The apartment is fully furnished, cleaned regularly, and includes a complete kitchen (including a fridge, utensils, pots and pans). The building also includes a fully equipped gym, patio, and laundry facilities, which have been very convenient.

I've stayed here multiple times for years now, highly recommended!

title: Perfect stay in the city
text:
Perfect location! Anything you can think of is nearby, including Grancentral Station.
The room is so comfortable. Carpets make you feel at home, great amenities with kitchen, spacious couch and bed, and more importantly so nice people.
Gym, laundary room is in the building. What can you ask for more. Trust me. I have been in Murray Hills suites 5-6 times, and it is the only place I want to stay in NY.

title: Memorable stay at the Murray Hill East Suites
text: We had a wonderful stay at the Murray Hill East. The property  is in a very central part of the city close to the Grand Central Train Station. We had a one bedroom suite which was very spacious for the three of us. The living room has a sofa bed where our son slept. Both the living room and bedroom has TVs which was a plus.  The kitchen comes with cooking utensils and dinnerware as well as cutlery.  They have a gym, laundry room and also a business center. The Front Desk and Housekeeping staff are the best. We will definitely return.

title: Rats in the room (but this can happen) Not family friendly, poor not receptive management, stay away.
text:
The worst experience with an hotel EVER. I wouldn’t recommend this place to anyone, for sure this is not a place for families with young children like ours - families, please stay away. 
We spot a mouse in our apartment (we could even film it!) and even if they were aware we had 2 children were left there with it for a night. The day after they said they would have given us a new apartment but then they changed their mind saying that - since they caught the mouse  (FALSE!) we could have stayed there. When we said that was not an option because of hygienic reasons (they have not even cleaned there) they said they wouldn’t have given another apartment because my children stained the carpet and they could have done it again. We’ve found ourselves with 2 young children without a clean place to spend the night in and we had to stay there another night with the mouse, the glue they put and what the animal left behind.  I felt discriminated because of the children and cheated several times. Also Wi-Fi connection in the room very poor in case you need to work from there. Personnel rude with the exception of 2 guys at the reception that have been kind with us (but with no power to make decisions). COVID Rules not respected, not even by their personnel. The cleaning lady laughed at me because I didn’t want to share the elevator with other people to keep distances even if that was in line with hotel instructions. Lastly I came to pick up some boxes / mails that were delivered there when I left and found 1 box open and empty inside. I think this is the worst review I have ever written - you can check in my profile, I am never that negative - but hope this helps other people avoid unpleasant situations such the ones I and my family lived.

title: Great spot
text: We stayed here during September/ October and it was great, check in was easy and the front desk staff very friendly. We had a 1 bedroom apartment which was very roomy more than enough space for 3 to move around, with the kitchenette so you could cook if you wanted too. Close to everything you need, Grand central station a couple of blocks down to catch the subway and only 10 minute walk to Times square and Macy's. Away from the main hustle and bustle but still close to everything.

title: Nice and convenient for long stay
text: We spent 1 month at Murray Hill East in Manhattan and it was a great experience.  You are in the middle of the big Apple and price for a long stay is very reasonable.  We are not talking about a 5 stars hotel but it's very clean and very well managed. All the people working there from the front desk to the rooms cleaners are nice and professional. Small gym but very nice one. Thanks a lot for the nice time we spent in NYC !!!!

title: TERRIFIC LONG STAY OPTION
text: Located conveniently in midtown, Murray Hill offers a comfortable, cozy and clean alternative to a hotel.  The decor is a bit dated but all quite functional.  The neighborhood is safe and extremely quiet. The staff are all extremely helpful and friendly. All in all, a fine place to stay at a reasonable price. Bravo.

title: Buena opcion ...
text:
El lugar es comodo, tiene habitaciones con cocinas que facilitan y economizan la estadia, uno puede  hacerse el desayuno o cena. 
Las instalaciones estan bien cuidadas, nada lujoso pero bien.
Tiene guarda de equipaje por unos dias. 
En el subsuelo tienen lavaropas y secadoras

title: Excelente ubicación!
text:
Me aloje dos veces en este hotel, una en una habitación estándar y la segunda en un departamento. Esta muy bien ubicado a pocas cuadras de la estación central, biblioteca publica, Empire State, etc. Las habitaciones están muy bien equipadas, con maquinas para café, tostadora, heladera, lava platos dependiendo el tamaño de la habitación.-
Quiero destacar la atención del personal, siempre predispuestos a ayudar.-

title: MUY RECOMENDABLE
text: Magnífica situación, calle 39, a un paso de la estación Gran Centra, entre 3ª avenida y Park Av.l. Habitaciones grandes, en suite, con pequeña cocina para desayunos. Nadie te molesta, Limpieza eficaz. De lo más recomendable. Si vuelvo por New York, repetiré.

title: no cumplieron con su palabra
text: Estuve hospedad allí el mes de abril pasado y por un motivo familiar tuve que regresar en la mitad de mi estadía. El Sr Stanley, me envió un mail diciendo que no podrían reembolsarme el dinero de los casi 18 días restantes pero que mi habitación estaría disponible por un año. Hace un mes les escribo para poder finalizar mi estadía y NO RESPONDEN, se hacen los desentendidos. UNA VERDADERA VERGÜENZA, FALTA DE PALABRA Y EDUCACIÓN

title: Great Place for an Extended Stay in Murray Hill
text: My daughter stayed here for about 5 weeks while doing her internship at a bank a few blocks away.    She thoroughly enjoyed her stay... the room was clean,  comfortable,  spacious and certainly quite cool during those  90+ degree days.   The staff was great.... Dennis Jr,  and Ray  were courteous,  friendly and always helpful.    But the most important thing I want to emphasize is that I was thoroughly comfortable having my 18 year old daughter stay here..... with a 24hour doorman and front desk  I was never worried about her safety.   We will definitely stay here next summer !   Thank you  Murray Hill East Suites.

title: Loved Murray Hill Suites
text: My husband and I stayed in a one bedroom apartment for one month and thoroughly enjoyed our apartment. The staff was very accommodating and was willingly to bring us anything we wanted for the kitchen. The living room and bedroom were both spacious and the kitchen and bathroom were adequate for two people. Our apartment had been updated and looked out on 39th Street. Murray Hill Suites is located near Grand Central so we were able to walk three blocks and take the subway at Lexington and 42nd St. We highly recommend Murray Hill Suites.

title: Pleasant week
text: Thanks to the staff at Murray Hill Apartments our stay was very comfortable. Being in central Manhattan it's very convenient to plan your day and roam around the city.  The amenities and services provided have also been very satisfying.

title: estupenda1
text: el Murraysuites es el mejor lugar para estar en NYc. tienen todos los servicios que pueden necesitar, lavadero, gim, recepcion, servicio de limpieza, esta cerca de todos lados, el personal es ESTUPENDO. Hablan varios idiomas, te resuelven todas las inquietudes, con esmero y gentileza, lo cual en nyC no es frecuente. NO DUDEN EN CONTRATARLO. YO volvere al mismo lugar.

title: Buena Ubicacion- Muy buena atencion
text: Muy buena atencion. Studio en el piso 8vo con cocina equipada amplio y confortable. Business Center y Laundry muy buenos. Destacamos especialmente su personal. Siempre dispuesto y atento ante cualquier necesidad. Quiza la unica objecion es que no contaban con Caja de Seguridad en el Studio.  Esperamos volver pronto.

title: Excelente ubicación en el corazón de Manhatan
text: Buenas y amplias habitaciones, con servicio de limpieza. Ideal para viajes con pareja o de trabajo. El único punto negativo es que tienes Wifi solo en el hall del edificio pero no en las habitaciones. Por lo menos yo que trabajo con mi laptop fue un poco incomodo.

title: Solid spacious long stay option in Midtown
text: If you come for work to Midtown, and need a longer rental, Murray Hill East Suites are perfect. Studio is spacious, bed is good, everything works and is super functional. All staff very super super friendly and helpful which is such an added bonus! I will definitely come again !

title: Ottima scelta
text: Posizione ottima sia per spostarsi di giorno che la sera, camere spaziose, pulite e nel mio caso con una vista pazzesca sull Empire state build, ristorante ottimo e roof top all'ultimo piano molto carino. consigliato a tutti famiglie, coppie etc

title: Ottima posizione e calda accoglienza!
text:
Il Murray Hill si trova in una posizione strategica...vicino ad ogni cosa, con tanti ristoranti, supermercati, negozi nelle immediate vicinanze. Ho trovato la struttura molto accogliente sotto molti punti di vista, primo fra tutti la cordialità e simpatia del personale con cui ho anche avuto il piacere di conversare più volte anche scherzando con loro. Oltre che simpatici, sono molto professionali ed attenti alle necessità dei clienti, oltre che disponibili a fornire ogni informazione o indicazione utile. Molto comoda la lavanderia e la palestra situate nello stesso edificio. L'appartamento era decisamente pulito, con possibilità di chiedere asciugamani o quant'altro necessario anche nei giorni diversi dalla prevista giornata di rifacimento degli appartamenti. L'unico appunto che forse posso fare è l'arredamento un po' datato...ma in realtà non mi ha disturbato molto...per certi versi l'ho trovato interessante...gli ambienti sono caldi e confortevoli e la cucina è decisamente comoda.
Assolutamente consigliato per soggiorni medio/lunghi!

title: Buena Estancia, Buena Ubicación
text: Fuimos dos familias, estuvimos en apartamentos amplios con cocina y una sala estar. El Hotel esta muy bien situado muy cerca de la 5ª avenida, tiene wifi gratuito sólo en el hall de la entrada. La relación calidad precio está bien para NY. Muy cerca hay una tienda donde puedes comprar comida y bebida, nosotros nos haciamos nuestros aperitivos con cervecitas, una estancia muy agradable.

title: Ótima opção para longa temporada
text: Localização excelente com estação de metro perto. O espaço dos quartos é ótimo. Estrutura para ficar muito bem acomodado, cozinha equipada e apartamento muito espaçoso. Uma ótima opção para quem fica um período de pelo menos 30 dias.

title: Love this place
text: I used to stay here a lot about 10 years ago.  They used to offer stays by the night but now I believe that it is by the month.  It's very clean and comfortable.  Like a little apt in the city.  I wish they still offer it by the night.

title: A good place to stay in Manhattan
text:
The Murray Hill Suites are extended stay facility, that is for staying for a period of one month or more and a good place in Manhattan. Its closeness to the UN Headquarters and other business centres makes it attractive. It is also near to the Grand Central Railway / Subway Junction. 
The rooms/suites are of different sizes and come with different rates, which are affordable. The rooms / suites also have kitchenette and give flexibility to cook and enjoy your meal, in case you want to. There are eating places and outlets as well as stores nearby.

title: Great for a long stay
text: Stayed here for a month on business.  The room size is large and spacious.  Kitchen has basic amenities like a gas, oven and utensils.  You can ask for a microwave and a toaster if you need.  Or for that matter more utensils should you need them.  The Grand Central is right at hand and the Times square a pleasant 20 minutes walk away.  In the neighborhood are a number of restaurants to cater to a variety of tastes.  I found the staff very friendly and cooperative.  Had a thoroughly pleasant stay and would definitely use the establishment if I visit again.

title: MUY BUENA "PRIMER" EXPERIENCIA
text: fuimos tres amigas a pasar 8 dias de vacaciones, fue GENIAL!!! MARAVILLOSO, si bien hace bastante que fuimos aprovecho esta oportunidad para recomendar este lugar, buenisima atención y predisposición del encargado y mucamas, el hotel lo estaban pintando pero no fue ningún inconveniente, todo fue maravilloso!! lo super recomiendo!

title: Convinient longsstay
text: Stayed here on a month-long vacation. The hotel is a little old-fashion but clean and some rooms are newly renoverad. The staff are friendly and hepful. The kitchen is maybe not as fully equippped as I hade hoped but ok for  basic cooking.  The hotel has a great location near Grand Central and the subway.  I could easily recommend this hotel for longsstay in New York.

title: Living as a New Yorker
text: Spacious room (a queen size bed each), with all the comforts of home. Well equipped kitchen, which allowed us to have some meals and even invite a couple of guests for lunch and dinner! The staff was friendly and very helpful.

title: Nicest staff ever
text:
Great experience..nicest staff...they couldn't have been friendlier or helpful.
Great location..easy to get around the city..laundry in building and so many restaurants nearby. It felt like family and that we really lived there!

title: Summer rental
text: We rented an apartment for four dancers who were in NYC for five weeks.  The apartment was very spacious and clean. The staff was so helpful and friendly. We thoroughly enjoyed our stay and would return!

title: Cordiality, spacious, nice location with kitchen
text:
Spacious apartment with kitchen.
Good location, close to good restaurants and transportation (Grand Central station).
Cordiality of hotel team is outstanding.
Adequate for long staying.
Decoration of the apartment we stayed was old fashioned with no impact in comfort.

title: REFUND NOT RECEIVED! NOT RELIABLE
text: Stayed in Murray Hill East Suites in May 2016. The room is very old fashioned. The sheets/pillow cases not cleaned or not changed frequently. BUT the worse is that they were not accommodating in refunding. Refund still not received after more than 1 month. There were no replies after several emails and when I called, the staff was rude.

title: Friendly spacious central location
text: I stayed here for 4 weeks. The staff are extremely friendly and very helpful meeting all your needs. My room was very spacious and is reflected in the photos on the website. The location is perfect for walking to Central Park, the subway at Grand Central and Bryant Park. If I return to NYC this will be my first choice accommodation.

title: Pleasant hassle free stay
text: Totally Recommended. Room size was very good and friendly staff and convenient location As its in the middle of Manhattan . Grand central was pretty close .bryant park was just 10mun away . Everything was perfect for long stay

title: Ottima posizione
text:
La posizione dell'hotel e' fantastica. Nel bel mezzo di Murray Hill nel corcondario si trovano negozi e ristoranti. Inoltre si e' molto vicini alla stazione centrale.
Sicuramente la pulizia della camera non e' stata ottimale. L'arredento un po datato soprattutto per la cucina, ed inoltre abbiamo avuto un odore di pollo nella nostra stanza praticamente per tutta la durata del soggiorno.

title: Dont book this hoten, not reliable and stinky
text:
I booked my room one month in advance, however I arrived and didn't find it ready even they promised by email and telephone a good room which I didn't get. The room was in a stinky floor I have requested to change the room, they did after two weeks of my request, half the period of my stay. I asked my money back to change the hotel they refused so I had to stay. 
Very bad experience and terrible hotel, very basic service.
Im going back to NY for 6 months I refuse to stay there even for free!!!!
I don't recommend this hotel.

title: Well located
text: Very well equipped and excellently located. It's a great balance between a hotel and a private apartment. The rooms are spacious and have all that is required for a great stay in the Big Apple at walking distance from many landmarks and transport!

title: Meu preferido há algum tempo
text: Frequentei muito e recomento. É ótimo, bem localizado e bem espacoso. Várias viajens a trabalho e lazer desde a década de 90. ótimo apartamento,cozinha bem equipada e sempre limpa, acomodações de primeira, próximo á quaquer ponto de interesse em NYC.

title: bien ubicado, habitaciones amplias, pero feo, sucio y con servicio deficiente
text:
encontrar en NY apartamentos amplios, con estar y cocina, en un buen barrio cerca de ONU y a pasos de la Estación Central parece una buena noticia, todavía mejor si el precio (aunque caro para otro destino) no parece tan alto para el promedio de NY.
El problema es que el lugar es muy viejo, el aseo es deficiente, no hay wifi gratuito en las habitaciones y la atención es inexistente... como puede ver es un lugar con pros y contras... usted decide... porque este es el típico caso en que la valoración dependerá mucho de lo que cada uno de los viajeros considera importante.

title: Murray Hill Suites
text: I've stayed in this hotel twice, the last time was in May 2015, and I absolutely love this hotel. Set in a quieter location than some hotels in NY but still within easy walking distance of Grand Central Station (less than 5 minutes walk) and many other iconic sights such as: Macy's, Times Square, The Empire State Building, Fifth Ave.  The suites are clean and spacious and offer everything you need for your stay in the Big Apple. The staff are helpful, friendly and knowledgeable. The room rates are so competitive for the accommodation size being a suite. It's nice to be able to have a separate living room area to relax in rather than just a chair or the end of your bed. I'm looking to go back to NYC soon and was mortified to find out this hotel now only offers a minimum 30 day stay. Most visitors to the city are from overseas and stay in NY on average for around a week. I think this hotel has now norrowed their target audience. I now have to start the mamouth task of finding another hotel suite of a similar standing. :(

title: Excelente por su precio y ubicación!
text: Tuvimos una muy agradable estadía en este hotel. La ubicación es muy buena, a pocas cuadras de Grand Cental Station y en un barrio tranquilo. Las habitaciones son grandes y la atención muy buena. La recepción se mostró dispuesta a recibir paquetes de compras mientras estabamos fuera del hotel. Las comodidades son acordes al precio y a lo que es esperable de la cara hotelería en Nueva York. Tiene WiFi gratuito en el Lobby.

title: Все отлично!
text:
Очень классное место! Близко от таймс сквер и гранд централ! 
Отличное соотношение цена - качество! 
Номер был большой. Совершенно четко оправдывает уровень звездности! 
При возможности обязательно остановимся здесь еще раз!

title: Ótima opção!
text: Murray Hill East Suites fica numa rua tranquila perto da Grand Central Station e muito próximo dos pontos turísticos de Nova Iorque. Trata-se na realidade de um apart hotel e pra quem viaja com a família a comodidade de ter uma cozinha com micro ondas, fogão e geladeira é muito importante. Na esquina vc tem um pequeno mercado que possibilita ao menos providenciar um café da manhã . É um hotel com a limpeza muito boa ( não perfeita), ótimo chuveiro e atendimento gentil. A internet só está disponível nos espaços de convívio e pra uso nos quartos é necessário pagar. Recomendadíssimo!!

title: Major renovations required
text: Rooms are old. Very small lobby space, Too expensive for that kind of room and kitchen equipment.  It is in a very good location thats all... I will not book again. A regular hotel would be cheaper and much more nicer...

title: Average Hotel but Outstanding Room Size
text:
This is a no frills, somewhat outdated hotel... But who comes to NYC to spend time in a hotel room? It is a great location in mid-town and the rooms are huge. We were upgraded to a junior suite and it had a spacious sitting room/ dining area, small kitchenette and large bed area. I could definitely see staying here for a long term stay. It is on a quiet street, nearby some consulates and other UN related buildings. 

This hotel checks all the boxes if you're looking for a reasonably priced hotel in Manhattan.

title: Ótimo apartamento no coração de Manhattan!
text:
Ótimo apartamento com cozinha equipada e  sala de estar,  próximo a tudo. Hotel antigo, mas tudo funcionou bem. Superou minhas expectativas pois reservei na promoção e o preço foi ótimo para um quarto deste tamanho em NYC. Recomendadíssimo.
Contras:internet paga e não muito boa. Limpeza é razoável,  achamos uma meia atras da cama!

title: Minimum 30 Day Stay Now
text: I don't know why I'm not seeing this anywhere, but there is now a minimum 30 day stay required for this hotel.  So sad.  I've stayed here in the past and really enjoyed it - though I did get stuck in the elevator (but not too long).  The rooms are quite large (basically larger than probably any other room in NYC), the prices fair, the views good, and the location really great!  Very safe location too.  So what if the decor is dated.  I'll take room size, location and safety for a fair price any day over decor.  I'd definitely stay here again, if not for the now minimum 30 day stay.

title: 3 Nächte������
text:
Alles Gut super gelegen man kann alles zu Fuß erreichen 😃😃
Grand Staiton in weniger als 10 Min. und kommt noch am Chrysler Bulding vorbei 
Zum Empire State Bulding sind es ca. 20 interessante Minuten😎
Zimmer alter Stil und alles sauber. Denkt an Stromsdapter

title: Long stay
text: I'm in this hotel for 12 days now and I will stay 3 months more , this hotel offer long stay only min 30 days , it's in the south east side of Manhattan and in a good location , staff are very friendly and there is a Lundry room at the basement and gym too , all rooms has a small kitchen  , some of the rooms are renovated recently, the finishing of the room too old and simple

title: un buen complejo de departamentos...
text: Nos hospedamos con mi novia durante 15 días en una habitación del hotel. Un departamento muy preparado para recibir turistas. Una cocina amplia con todos los elementos de cocina y todo funciona a la perfección. Fuimos en febrero y como hace mucho frio, la calefacción 10 puntos. Muy confortable la habitación y buena atención de conserjería recomendando lugares para visitar. Todos hablaban español y fueron muy amables

title: Muy bueno
text: Muy buena ubicacion a 3 cuadras aprox de Grand Central Station. Varios supermercados cerca y cuenta con cocina. Es un hotel viejo pero que esta bien mantenido, el staff es bastante atento y solucionan tus problemas. Lo unico malo es que eramos 4 y dormimos 2 en un sofa cama que no era tan comodo; te cobran el internet en la habitacion. Recomendable

title: Wonderful Experience!
text:
My family and I had the opportunity to visit New York this summer for the month of July.  Being from South Carolina and having limited knowledge about NYC, we were very anxious about where to stay.  After much deliberation, we chose the Murray Hill East East Suites.  We could not have made a better choice!

The staff was wonderful, the room was great, and the location was perfect.  It is not a fancy mega hotel with loads of amenities.  It is very nice, but simple.  The staff keeps it very clean.  They are friendly and attentive to your needs.  They always greeted us with a smile and I got to know several of them by name.  We truly felt at home in NYC because of the staff at Murray Hill East.

In addition, the location is safe.  Easy walking distance from Grand Central where you can catch the subway to anywhere in NYC.  Walking distance from Times Square also, but away from the crowds of the touristy areas.  Lots of restaurants nearby.  A Shake Shack is within a block.  Also a grocery store and two pharmacies within two to three blocks.

Our room was on the 10th floor on the courtyard side.  It was very large by NYC standards and very quiet!  We live in a rural area, and many nights our room in NYC was just as quiet as it is at home.  

The fitness center is a little small, but very nicely equipped.  The laundry room was clean and the machines were industrial quality - very fast.  The housekeeping staff was just as friendly as the front desk people.  The doormen were a delight!  Both were very personable and welcoming.

This is one trip we will remember forever.  The staff delivered everything promised - and more.  If you are going to NYC for an extended period of time, this is the place for you!

title: Muy práctico y excelente ubicación
text: Está cerca de todo. Los departamentos son mu cómodos y limpios y la ventaja de tener cocina y vajilla hace que resulte muy práctico.Dispone de wifi gratuito en el lobby, pero no llega a las habitaciones. Cuando estuvimos debíamos pagar la conexión que  solo era para 2 equipos.

title: Ottima posizione
text: Ho alloggiato un mese al Murray Hill e che dire camera con vista da sogno front empire...cucina (mai usufruita come si fa ad andare a nyc e mangiare in hotel😒)pulizia della camera abbastanza mediocre in 1 mese le lenzuola se non l'avessi fatto notare non l3 avrebbero mai cambiate e gli asciugamani per diverse volte non venivano cambiati! !infatti ero costretta a gettarli in vasca e bagnarli detto questo non aggiungo altro..il wi-fi è disponibile solo nella lobby affollata e piena di gente non spesso educata che urla e quant'altro...portiere sempre molto gentile altrettanto non si può dire della ragazza alla reception..fortunatamente rientravo la sera quindi non ci ho avuto molto a che fare . ottima posizione a 5 Min da Central station e da park Avenue e 15 da Central park a parte il disguido lenzuola sicuramente ci ritornei e ritornerò

title: Hidden Value
text: We have been staying at Murray Hill East since the early 1990's. It is a converted apartment building.  You can rent a variety of configurations, we chose a one bedroom,one bathroom unit that had a kitchen, dining area and living room.  The unit was clean although dated.  The central location is terrific and you are left with the feeling that you are living in NYC,  When we go to NYC we like the usual sightseeing venues, especially the theater, all within walking distance or requiring a short cab ride.  The staff are friendly and there are any number of restaurants in the neighborhood as well as a grocery store if you choose to eat in your unit.  The value is terrific and the stay has always been pleasant.

title: Lowcost apartmenthotel
text:
If you are looking for a lowcost stay app. 20 minutes walking distance from Times Sq. This is Perfect!! Although the room looks like something from the 1970's it have all you posibly could want. I stayed 2 weeks in a so called studiosuite. It was a B I G room (app 50 sq.m.) with every thing you could possibly want... 
I highly recommend this hotel if you aren't to picky on the "up to date" furbishments..
I will most definatly stay there again!!
Oh, last but not least... : a most polite and welcoming staff!!!

title: Muy recomendable precio, calidad y ubicación
text: Alquilamos un departamento con dos habitaciones y dos baños, cocina completa. Todo perfecto, limpio, silencioso y buena atención. A solo 3 cuadras de la estación Gran Central. Muy recomendable. Tiene Laundry en el subsuelo. Lo malo es que no tiene wifi en las habitaciones....hay que bajar al lobby

title: Muy buena ubicación
text:
Viaje con mis padres, hna y novio. Eramos 5 en un depto con 2 camas grandes y un sillon cama en el living. Cocina completa, decoración de los años 80 pero limpio y prolijo. 
Buena opcíón para ir en grupo (minimo 3, 4 personas). La ubicación es muy buena, cerca de la estación central, y de las principales atracciones de NYC (Times Square, Empire State, 5ta Avenida, etc). Sin lujos, pero lo recomiendo. Solo se usa para dormir y cocinar alguna cena, así que está muy bien!

title: Estupendos!
text: Pillamos una habitación para 4 personas. Dos en la habitación tas dos en el sofá cama de salón.  Los muebles en general algo viejos pero en buen estado. Excepto el sofá -cama q era una tortura para dormir. La cocina era lo justo, bien, pero su ventana no se podía abrir por lo q al cocinar no se podía ventilar. Tenía wifi en el lobby, que se agradece. La situación del hotel con respecto a Manhattan inmejorable pa el precio que pagamos, ya que lo contratamos en páginas con ofertas y salió muy barato.

title: Great stay
text: Rooms here are really big. Kitchen was a real bonus as our daughter has alot of allergies,so great to be able to cook here meals. plenty of room for e eryone and wonderful location. very helpful and friendly staff.  will be back here again.

title: Muy buena Opcion!!!!
text:
fui con mi familia, 3 hermanos y mama, las habitaciones super buenas, amplias, luminosas y totalmente equipadas. 

la Ubicacion excelente

la atencion muy buena

lo unico es que el wifi esta solo en el lobby, pero esta bueno.

title: Excelente ubicación y atencion
text:
Departamentos amplios, excelente limpieza y una ubicación de primera (A 3 cuadras del grand central y a 10 del time square). Lo hacen excelente para la estadía en nueva york.
El personal atiende de primera, en idioma español e ingles y están dispuestos a recomendar peseos y solucionar cualquier problema

title: Apto Completo-comodo- muy bien ubicado
text:
Estuvimos en un apartamento con un dormitorio y el living un sofá cama.
Mesa con 4 sillas y cocina separda (completamente equipada, hasta lavavajilla)
La limpieza muy bien.
El baño super amplio.
La cama matrimonial muy cómoda y grande.
Los empleados de la recepción muy gentiles, 
El barrio muy bueno, con un supermercado D'agostino donde comprar muy rica comida pronta y a buen precio.
Volveria seguro

title: Excelente! Es un apartamento completo.
text: Es un apartamento completo, con sala de estar y comedor y cocina completa. Hay un supermercado a una cuadra por lo que es muy cómodo. Puedes ir caminando a cualquier lugar de medio Manhattan y si aprendes a utilizar el Subway vas a cualquier lugar! Es un excelente alojamiento en pleno Manhattan muy cómodo y muy bien equipado.

title: Hermoso Lugar
text: Hermoso Hotel, muy bien ubicado, las habitacion super amplias y comodas, el baño super completo, muy LIMPIO!!! muy buena atencion del conserje y de todos los empleados, siempre dispuestos a ayudar y aconsejar a que lugar ir. esta cerca de la 5ta avenida, y hay varios lugar para ir a comer cerca, y un super a la vuelta que te saca de un apuro,. MUY RECOMENDABE, sin DUDAS VOLVERIA!!!

title: Not the best but good
text:
Pros: Good location close to the Central station - walking distance to the Empire State building, Times Square, clean spacy and comfortable rooms with  kitchen, nice staff.

Cons: No free wifi in the rooms, furniture and household equipment a little bit outdated.

Overall it was a good experience and i would stay here again next time

title: Lovely Surprise
text: Front Desk & Doorman were so helpful and cheerful - gave excellent travel and dining advice.  Our Suite was a lovely surprise - quite spacious and new - beautiful decorations - dining / living area, Bedroom area, kitchen and bath - we did not expect so much space and comfort! Bed & linens extremely comfortable - heat worked well - entire wall of windows, bright but no street noise - nicely covered with blinds, sheers and darkness drapes.The garden level and fitness area are new and fresh.  Location was terrific - 2 blocks down Park Ave after leaving Grand Central at 42nd St - easy to walk or take subway to all locations.

title: Great location.  Plenty of room!
text: The Murray Hill East Suites is a great place to stay with family.  The suite consisted of a large living room/dining room; a small kitchen with a full size refrigerator; a bedroom larger than most hotel rooms; and of course, a decent size bathroom.  Reasonably priced considering the amenities.

title: Totalmente recomendable
text: El hotel tiene una muy buena ubicación, a pocas cuadras  al subte, colectivos, cerca del Empire State, de la 5ta Av. y varias atracciones mas,  a la vuelta hay un supermercado, lo cual te permite ahorrar mucho dinero en concepto de las comidas ya que el hotel cuenta con una muy cómoda cocina. Es destacable la atención del personal, siempre bien predispuestos para ayudarte en lo que necesites.La habitación era grande y cómoda. Buen servicio de limpieza. totalmente recomendable. Volvería sin dudas!

title: Excelente!!!
text:
Muy aceptable nuestra estadia en el Murray suites, la ubicacion es super comoda, y me sorprendio la gran atencion de sus empleados, los precios son un poco caros , como todo hospedaje en New york, pero realmente me senti comodo.
Sin lugar a dudas volveria

title: Excelente opção
text:
Ótima localização, próximo à Grand Station é fácil acesso aos principais pontos turísticos de NY.
A suíte é bastante espaçosa, com sala e mini cozinha, equipada com utensílios, fogão, geladeira, cafeteira, etc.
Limpeza impecável.
Não há Wi-Fi nos quartos, ponto negativo. 
Recomendo.

title: Very nice hotel in the middle of everything and even had a kitchen
text: The hotel was nice but you had to pay for parking no matter where you were. $25 a day was a lot. So if you can get other kinds of transportation if you don't want to pay. It is highly recommended. The hotel looks like it used to be an apartment complex but the room was really nice and upgraded very well. I had a nice view of the NY buildings. It was very spacious but I definitely could see it being a one bedroom apartment before it was turned into a hotel. The staff was pretty friendly. I can't say that it was cheap because it wasn't but it was extremely nice and comfortable. The gym was very nice and user friendly. Overall I would definitely stay there again because it made my NY experience just that much more enjoyable.

title: A nice place to stay when you visit New York
text: The hotel is in Middle Manhatan (39th. between Lexington Ave. and 3rd. Ave.). Clean, confortable and with kind attention. Not breakfast inclouded. The kitchnette had all the items required for cooking quick meals. For us, everything ok.

title: Da migliorare
text: Ogni volta che mi reco a NY cerco di prenotare il Murray Hill perché si trova in ottima posizione ed ha un buon rapporto qualità prezzo! Questa volta la pulizia delle stanze non è stata al massimo ed è assolutamente da rivedere la dotazione degli utensili in cucina!!!! Qualcosa in più non guasterebbe posate pentole hanno fatto il loro tempo!!!! Meglio scegliere camere in alto perché dal momento che hanno fatto la ciclabile e il parcheggio bici sulla strada il traffico e' aumentato e c'è rumore . Deliziosi come sempre i door-men cordiali e servizievoli , molto meno gli addetti alla reception escluse le donne

title: Very Pleased!
text: I am not 100% clear why there are so many negative reviews for this hotel? I stay in hotels over 100+ nights a year so I have stayed in all types of hotels!.My experience here was terrific. Yes it is an older hotel so it has an older feel and older décor BUT absolutely nothing wrong with it in my experience. Friendly staff, good location, my room was huge, clean, comfortable bed, and quiet. Again very pleased! I would recommend this hotel and would have no problem staying here again. The pictures from travelers are accurate and can give you a sense of the style for this hotel.

title: Like having your own Manhattan apartment
text: We have stayed at Murray Hill East several times.  Really like the residential neighborhood feel of this area - it seems to be quieter and not as hectic as other places we have stayed at in Manhattan.  We had a studio room which is very spacious for two people.  It actually was an apartment or condo once upon a time and has a kitchenette, dining area with table and chairs, sofa and chair in living room area as well as a bedroom/bath area with two large closets.  The staff is friendly and helpful but one of them hinted that the hotel may be closing soon for "renovations".  While the place could certainly use a facelift I really hope that is really the reason they will be closing and not that they have been sold and will become something else.  There are many convenience stores nearby as well as many different types of restaurants.  Also  nearby are several bagel shops and coffee shops for a quick breakfast.  It is a quick 2-3 block walk to Grand Central Station where you can catch subways to wherever in Manhattan or the boroughs you care to go.  Just walking through the food areas of Grand Central on the way to or from the subways is eye candy and very tempting.  The Liberty Express bus runs every 15 minutes or so from near Grand Central to and from Newark Airport - I believe on 41st between Park and Lexington which is very handy for those arriving or departing from EWR.

title: A great choice for those with low expectations
text:
A perfect hotel for you if:
• You like really cheap sheets and towels and have an aversion to anything with natural fibers like cotton
• Love the sound of a busy NYC street at night — the windows on the street side do not provide any meaningful sound protection.  I actually thought the windows were open — they weren't.
• LIke mid-1960's decor.  

Management thoughtfully provides lots of pillows,which was perfect.  I used one to sleep on, 2 to drown out the street noise and one to cover the flashing red message light on the phone next to the bed that wouldn't turn off.  Also, one of the very few hotels still using the archaic practice of placing a $20 hold on guests credit cards to cover any extras.  Really??

title: Great location and comfortable bed
text: We chose this hotel for the location (we like the Murray Hill area) and price. I admit that the complaints I read on Trip Advisor about the old mattresses and noisy rooms facing the street gave me concern, but, happily, our suite had a new mattress and we asked for and got a room facing the courtyard. Very quiet and we got a good night's sleep. The furniture is not the newest or most chic, but adequate. We were upgraded to a one-bedroom suite that was plenty spacious and very clean. The staff was most pleasant. We'd stay again..

title: Don,t
text: I stayed here with my husband on a business trip and to be fair did not pay for the hotel myself. Still I have to voice my opinion. This is just SO outdated it is almost funny.if we moved In the bed the matress would rock like a boat. The furniture are scraped and the towels felt like paper.if you left them on the floor to be changed they just picked them back up and hung them up as clean ones. I know for sure because we tested it purposely twice!  The bathtub drain was so blocked I had to wait for one hour before I could shower in order not to stand kneedeep in my husbands bath water . We did not complain so of course we didn't give them the chance to fix things, but we just couldn't be bothered. The staff was absolutely friendly , but failed to ask for any sort of ID when we checked in. I thought that was the law. If you are satisfied with this then I guess it is ok, but it isn't rally that cheap for what you get. Don't book it if you are picky about we're you stay .

title: il mio preferito a New York!
text:
ogni volta che andiamo a New York prenotiamo sempre li!
strategico come posizione in pieno centro, 5 mim a piedi dalla metro di Gran Central Station, ti lavano anche i piatti se usi angolo cottura!
Locali molto ampi, buon rapporto qualità/prezzo.

title: Old hotel in a great location
text:
I stayed for one night in this hotel and was thankful that it was for only one night.  Everyone was very helpful and nice - concierge, front desk.  However, this hotel is old, run down and needs renovations in a bad way.

I would not recommend this hotel to people and would not stay there again.  I would pay a significant amount more to stay in another hotel. 

Great location, though.

title: Estúdio
text:
Ficamos em um quarto tipo estúdio com sala, pequena cozinha com fogão e geladeira e banheiro. Ideal para quem pretende economizar e realizar refeições no próprio Hotel. Localização excelente, próximo a Grand Central Station em bairro nobre de Manhatan.
Aspectos negativos: não tem wifi no quarto, apenas no saguão principal.

title: now better
text: last year i stayed in this hotel and wrote a review titled O.K . On our visit this year (september) i found the stuf more willing. the room we got was in beter shape even if the furniture was dated. i visit new york evry year for years and i have to say that i never saw room in this size (big- wide). the location is fabules and over the corner (38th) there is a supermarket so you can use the kitchenet in the room (studio). it realy worth the money even if their is no wi fi in the room if you don't pay 10$ a day(it's a shame).  eduard

title: The good, the bad and the noisy!
text:
I will start with the good: great location, big rooms, clean, good price (booked online w online blind pricing). The bad: as with other reviews, our bed was more hammock like than a bed. It was so bad we tried the pull out sofa bed - they were equally bad. Although we requested a non-smoking room I could still smell smoke from other rooms. Now for the noisy: after reading other reviews, I knew to ask for a room at the back, not on street. I called several days in advance to make the request and was told it was fine. When we arrived, I was told there were only two rooms left and they were both on the street. But the woman at the front desk assured me that the street (39th st) was not noisy, it's rooms on 3rd that are noisy... Come to find out, there are ho rooms on 3rd street and 39th street is extremely noisy! We stayed 3 nights and were told each day there were no other rooms available - I find this incredibly hard to believe, especially when the lobby is crowded with people checking out every morning. 
Would I stay here again, or recommend to a friend? Only if I was guaranteed a room at the back, but then again, I thought I was....

title: Great location
text: That was our second stay at the Murray Hill East Suites.We love this hotel,it has great location close to everything including the Broadway theatre district,subway,shuttle buses to the airports,Macy's,Empire State Building and so on.The hotel staff is friendly and helpful.The rooms are very large,with a kitchenette,two flat screen TV in each room.The rooms and bathroom are clean.I would rate this hotel as "excellent" but there're two big "buts" for me.The first is the absence of free WiFi in the rooms,it's available only in the lobby area.The hotel isn't cheap at all and I'm sure that a hotel of that level should have a free WiFi.Guys,it's the 21st century out there! The second "but" is the quality of mattresses,at least in our room.

title: Roomy Quiet Hotel
text: Lots of space to spread out in a quiet suite. Location was just right, walking distance to the theatre district and access to public transportation to museums to the north. Lots of  neighborhood places to eat and little grocery stores to pick up supplies for your complete kitchenette. Also, reasonably priced!

title: Murray Hill East is perfect NYC comfy home-away-from-home.
text:
Comfortable, safe, clean, pleasant, easy access (walking, taxi, & subway.) 

Very good mattresses, for great  night's sleep. Personable & professional service (cleaning, bell, front desk.) 

Full service kitchenette, & very good grocery store a block away. Also, multiple delivery service food options when just want food to show up. 

Straightforward, homey. Location in Murray Hill (East 39th St, between Lex & 3rd Ave) offers easy walking access to shopping, midtown, Chrysler Bldg, United Nations, Theater District, Times Square, & Grand Central Station. Easy to get cab or subway for all Manhattan locations & boroughs too.

Good kitchenette & restaurants nearby. However, hotel doesn't supply any food services directly FYI. Also, hotel is comfy but not fancy: simple, functional.

Suggest room high up as possible (NY is noisy like any big city). Best facing back, not facing 39th St. 

Best testimonial: we've returned 3x despite so many other Manhattan choices. Trips were combination of pleasure & business.

title: Muy útil
text: El Murray Hill East Suites de Nueva York tiene una excelente ubicación y el hotel es super lindo, limpio y con una atención de primera. Siempre con una sonrisa los empleados van a responder todas tus preguntas. La habitación es muy linda, lo cual hizo nuestras vacaciones excepcionales.

title: Great if you want to revisit 1989
text:
I personally don't have anything against 1989 except that it's 2014. This place, at best, is like walking into a time warp. Picture a decent hotel, now rewind to what that hotel would have looked like 25 years ago. Now advance to present day, but be sure to keep everything the same. That's this hotel.

Don't take my word for it, just look at some of the pictures taken by travelers. From that, it should be pretty clear that you don't want to stay in this place. I was stuck with this hotel thanks to the randomness of Priceline (lesson learned).

title: Great way to stay
text: Hotel is situated on 39 street, so it's very easy to reach also from the airport. Very clean, because they clean it everyday although it's an apartment. A kitchen is nice to have to make coffee during the day. It was also very warm with the heater.

title: Who is giving this place great reviews?
text:
I guess I can see how this place appeals to certain travelers -- students, vagabonds, bootstrapping entrepreneurs.

Was in NY for business. A day trip turned into an overnight and I needed a room last minute. Took a chance on a 3 star "deal" on Hotwire and this is where I landed. I was immediately concerned when I looked at the photos but after zipping through a few reviews on TA, I thought maybe it'll be OK.

Here's the deal with this place. Very good location. Easy access to Grand Central & Times Square. It's in a good neighborhood. The rooms are huge with a kitchen. And there's a pretty decent gym in the basement -- 2 treadmills, elliptical, some free weights. No issues with the staff and I never felt unsafe.

But there's no way this place deserves to be 3 stars and that's clear the second you get an actual, physical key upon check in. I mean, what was the last decent hotel you stayed in that was still handing out keys? The linens are clean but they're like hospital linens -- they've been in use for awhile and taken a beating. Furniture hasn't been updated in 30+ years. And it doesn't take long to notice spots of mold & rust around the room.

Like I said, this place is probably a great fit for some travelers. Just not for me.

title: Cómodo, limpio y bien ubicado!
text: Llegamos a finales de Septiembre y nos quedamos hasta la primera semana de octubre, la atención muy buena, en la recepción hablaban español... Las chicas que venían a limpiar la habitación siempre nos dejaban toallas de mas ...nos toco una habitación s úper grande con un living comedor muy cómodo con un sofá cama, la cocina completa y el dormitorio con dos camas grandes y cómodas, la zona tranquila y bien ubicado!

title: Znakomite miejsce na pobyt w NYC
text:
W tym hotelu spędziłam z rodziną tylko trzy noce. Bardzo żałuję, że byłam tu tak krótko, bo miejsce to spełniło wszystkie nasze oczekiwania. 
Apartament był naprawdę przestronny z miejscem do odpoczynku i częścią kuchenną całkiem dobrze wyposażoną w podstawowe sprzęty i naczynia. 
Wszędzie było czysto, estetycznie i wygodnie. Obsługa hotelowa bardzo uprzejma i pomocna.
A lokalizacja hotelu wręcz wymarzona! 
Na pewno wybrałabym ponownie to miejsce.

title: Great Budget Hotel in NYC
text: I ended up staying here after a blind Priceline bid.  The room is huge by NYC standards.  It comes with a four-burner gas kitchenette, a small dining area, a couch/tv area, a queen bed and a decent sized bathroom.  While the finishings are a bit dated, everything was very clean and well-maintained.  It is close to Grand Central and walkable to Midtown.  I would definitely stay here again.  It's no frills, but a great deal for price.

title: Excelente
text: O quarto é ótimo, cama muito confortável, uma sala com TV, sofá e poltrona, mesa e cadeira de escritório, uma mesa de jantar para 2 pessoas com poltrona, uma pequena cozinha com geladeirinha, fogão, pia, talheres, copos. É só pedir microondas que eles trazem sem custo. Closet, cofre, banheiro com secador e banheira.

title: sono
text: o murray é bem bom. mas não tem wifi gratis nos quartos e nem cafe da manha. quando vc se hospedar, peça um quarto que fique para os fundos, pois os quartos que ficam de frente para a rua são muito barulhetos.

title: Central position, friendly staff and excellent value for money
text:
Having read many of the reviews for this hotel on Tripadvisor we spent 5 nights there in September and were extremely happy we chose it.  

You couldn't ask for more helpful and friendly staff on Reception, especially Santa in our case.  We were given  a Junior Suite without asking for an upgrade.  Okay, the decor in the room was a little dated, as some of the reviews had said, but very spacious and comfortable with distinct lounge area and separate kitchenette.  However, we only stayed in that room one night as I had trouble with the noise from the street.  Probably wouldn't bother most but I don't sleep well at the best of times.

The following morning I spoke to Santa on Reception to see if she could move us to a quieter room at the back.  So helpful......she told us to leave our packed bags in the room and she'd arrange for us to be moved once a room became available later that day.  True to her word, we got back later to find we'd been given a Courtyard room at the back and all our luggage had been moved there.  Surprisingly on a lower floor but certainly very quiet.  Newly refurbished too.

The location of the hotel was ideal as very central to some of the main sights.  Only a couple of blocks from Grand Central Station and a couple more to the Empire State Building.  If you want glitzy, modern hotels maybe it's not the one for you.  However, if you want a clean, spacious and comfortable room in a hotel that has extremely friendly and helpful staff, that's also good value for money, then I'd recommend it without hesitation.  We'd certainly stay there again but would ask for a Courtyard room from the outset.

title: Хороший выбор
text:
Отель понравился. Плюсы: чуть в стороне, но при этом все недалеко; чистота; просторные номера, оборудованные кухнями; большое количество мебели, шкафов, тумбочек, вешалок; цена (выкупили номер по акции с невозможностью отмены); рядом продуктовый и винный магазины. Из минусов, пожалуй, можно отметить платный wi-fi, который работал только, если стоишь у двери и шумный обогреватель (нам он не мешал, но кому-то возможно будет не комфортно). 
Понравилось отношение к посетителям. Вместо обычной желтой машинки подали лимузин по цене обычного нью-йоркского такси.

title: MUY BUENA UBICACION Y ATENCION
text: Nuestra estadia la disfrutamos como lo deseabamos, ya que las comodidades que nos dieron se ajustaban a nuestro sistema de vida. Si D¨s quiere volveremos, buen trato de todo el personal, frente a un pedido nuestro era de rápida solución

title: Great Suites, Great Location, Decent Prices
text:
This was our second stay at Murray Hill and it was an overall pleasant experience as before.
This was a rather last minute booking and we were doubly pleased when we found that we were upgraded to a king suite. The staff is very helpful and attentive here, striving to personally resolve any problem. We had a problem with our key not working properly and the doorman came up with us to be sure he understood exactly what was wrong. He lent us his master key until a new key and lock repairs could be made the next morning.
The location is great, close to public transportation and many great restaurants.
Definitely will be back here again when we return to NYC.

title: HOTEL SUITE
text:
Muy buen hotel, excelentemente ubicación, Metro a 2 cuadras y media y cerca de las avenidas mas bonitas de NY.
La habitación grande y muy bien amueblada con muebles, lámparas y cuadros de buen gusto, la cocina completa y el baño confortable. El personal muy atento. 
A solo una cuadra y media se encuentra un super totalmente equipado y buenos precios

title: apartamento amplio y confortable
text:
La ubicacion no es mala, tampoco es la mejor  La habitacion tiene un dormitorio , cocina, bano y living comedor'.
La zona es tranquila y agradable.La limpieza es buena, el personal amable, nos dieron un late check out sin pedirlo'
Buena opcion para tres o cuatro personas

title: Perfecto!!!!
text: Elegimos este hotel ya que poseía cocina y nosotros que viajamos con niños nos favorecía , esta muy bien ubicado, cerca de la 5 AV y de Time Square, muy limpio y con servicio de mucama., también posee una zona de lavandería y gimnasio. Esta en una zona muy tranquila, hemos ido caminado de noche hasta Time Square y regresado tarde y uno puede ir tranquilo, a pocos pasos hay mercados y casas de comidas . A 2 cuadras se encuentra La Estación Central, hermosa!!! Sacamos ti Tickets y  anduvimos en subte por todos lados. También hay por todos lados hasta enfrente del hotel bicis las que uno puede adquirir por un lapso y dejarlas en otro sitio y ahí agarrar otra y así hasta donde uno quiera ir. De volver a NY volvemos al mismo hotel!!!!

title: Great Neighborhood & Easy accomidations
