text: The Murray Hill Suites where perfectly located near Grand Central for our escape to Flushing Meadows for US Open Tennis and an easy walk to Broadway for a Play.  Inexpensive for NYC and nice friendly staff.  The large rooms are a bit dated with tiny bathroom but you get a kitchen and the most comfortable bed I've slept on in a while.  Funky shower head, electrical sockets not friendly for all the gadgets as one was dead.  Well worth the money all in all.

title: 何かと便利でした
text: グランドセントラル駅まで徒歩5分程なので、地下鉄に乗るにはとても便利です。どの空港からのバスにも乗り易く、到着後、帰国時も便利。キッチンがあり、徒歩1分程度のところにスーパーもあります。ちゃんと食事が出来るようテーブルがあります。地下にランドリールーム（洗濯2ドル、乾燥2ドル）もあります。ただし、ロビー以外（部屋）でのWi-Fi使用にはお金がかかります。あと、フロントの方は日本語が話せません。ホテルに到着したのが朝の9時ごろでしたがチェックインできるとの事で、渡された鍵の部屋に入ったところ、誰かのラゲッジに充電中のiPhone、読みかけの本があり誰かかがまだ使用中の様子。フロントで説明すると違う部屋に通してくれましたが、泊まっている際は部屋に居るなら必ずチェーンロックをかけるべきだと思います。4泊しましたがチェックインの際に1日20ドルのデポジットを取られました。チェックアウト時に返金するとの説明で、返金されていることを確認しました。スタッフはとても良い人たちでした。

title: Excelente
text: Muy bien ubicado. El personal muy amable y en recepción hablan tanto inglés como español. Lo malo es que sólo hay wi fi en el lobby. Hay todo tipos de lugares para comer cerca(podes comprar y comer en la habitación) la habitación en excelente !!

title: Excelente ubicación
text:
Este hotel está muy bien ubicado, cercano a varios lugares que se pueden visitar caminando. A pasos del metro y de la estación de trenes Grand Central
Mi habitación tenía vista al edificio Empire State, era muy amplia cómoda, tiene cocina completa, es ideal para ir con la familia.

title: Excellent
text: My partner and I stayed here for 3 nights and got a brilliant deal. The room was huge, bigger than most New York apartments, and included a sofa, dining area and kitchen. The staff were really helpful and the location is amazing. Would go back tomorrow and would highly recommend.

title: Cercano a todo
text: Muy buena ubicación. Cerca del centro y del metro. Buenos departamentos con cocina y equipados y con buen servicio y limpieza. Hay wi fi en el loby solamente. Es una muy buena opción y superecomendable.

title: Una muy buena opcion, cerca de todo..
text:
Este hotel tiene como mayor ventaja la ubicacion, a solo tres cuadras de Grand central, es lo ideal para moverse a todos lados. Cuando llegamos nos dieron una habitacion superior a la que habiamos pagada. Un departamento con un living grande, cocina completa , bañco completo y una cuarto enorme, dificil de encontrar en NY. El hotel es una establecimiento que se nota que tiene muchos años, necesitaria una modernizacion rapida. pero es sumamente comodo y bien ubicado. Si bien no necesitamos demasiada ayuda, el personal siempre esta dispuesto y hay varios empleados que hablan perfecto castellano. el unico tema es que si necesitan internet, solo se puede tener wifi gratis en el lobby , con lo cual a veces es tedioso cuando uno nevcesita hablar por skype , por ejemplo< hacerlo en el medio de un lobby repleto de gente, ya que la mayoria del tiempo , esta muy lleno de gente utiizando internet. nosotros quisimos tener internet paga en la habitacion y ademas de ser muy cara no fncionaba.
otro punto que deberian mejorar es la limpieza, si bien en la mayoria de los dias estuvo aceptable, un domingo nos encontramos con que no habian realizado la limpieza correctamente, ni siquiera habian sacado la basura de la cocina.
es una opcion super comoda para quienes prefieren desayunar o cenar dentro del hotel ya que cuenta con cocina completa, y cafe gratis todos los dias en el cuarto.
por la noche la zona es apta para caminar tranquilamente hasta cualquier hora ya que hay mucho movimiento en la zona.
es una muy buena opcion para ir con niños ya que los cuartos son sumamente comodos y bien equipados. otra ventaja que tiene que no se encuentra en casi ningun hotel es el laundry en el subsuelo .
lo recomiendo como una muy buena opcion en cuanto al precio, a la ubicacion y al servicio.

title: Loved the location plus good sized rooms
text: For the price, the convenience of the location is hard to beat. I always use Grand Central station as the starting point to go around the city and it is only 3 blocks away from the hotel. The rooms are classified as suites and are spacious. Mine had a kitchen. There is some street noise that comes into the room, but that is not very unusual for NYC. A lot of conveniences around this location - bagel shops, Starbucks, banks, convenience stores, pharmacy etc. Would stay here again.

title: Home Sweet Home
text: I'm a native New Yorker that relocated to San Diego two years ago. This trip back home was going to be filled with lots of emotion. I'm happy to report that staying in a hotel that made me feel like I was just coming home after a long day at work made me feel like I never left. I'm looking forward to staying there again and again. I suggested this hotel to a friends mother and I'm proud to say she felt the same way I did. She'll be back.

title: Great location, great stay for the price!
text: We have stayed at the Murray Hill East Suites several times over the years and have never been disappointed, and we were not disappointed on our most recent trip either.  It is a great place to stay in New York City for a reasonable price.  My wife and I have tried similarly priced NYC hotels in the past and have been very disappointed with the service, upkeep, and cleanliness.  While the rooms at the Murray Hill East are dated, as you may read in other posts here, they are very large ("junior suites" with a kitchenette) for NYC standards and from what we have seen, very clean and well maintained.  The staff was friendly and accommodating, and we feel the location cannot be beat.  If accommodations and amenities need to be a large part of your NYC visit, you may want to look elsewhere.  The Murray Hill East Suites do not have many extras you might find at newer properties or resorts.  If you are going to see and do NYC, and are looking for an affordable, convenient, comfortable, and clean place to sleep, shower, and keep your stuff, the Murray Hill East Suites are perfect.  We will definitely stay again.  One constructive criticism is if the Murray Hill East were to upgrade, they should start with new mattresses.  That is where the "dated" is most apparent to me.

title: Muy buena ubicación
text: Nos alojamos por una semana en este hotel. Muy buena atención de los empleados. El departamento muy cómodo, servicio de limpieza excelente. Queda a 3 cuadras de Grand Central Station, así que nos movimos en subte muy bien. Utilizamos el wifi del lobby. Volvería sin dudarlo!

title: Excelente hotel residencial para quem viaja com filhos
text:
Bem localizado, rua agradável e com boa estrutura (deli numa esquina, supermercado na outra, farmácia, metrô e restaurantes próximos), suíte espaçosa e com muitos armários. A limpeza é boa, há uma ampla cozinha cujos utensílios poderiam ser mais novos, mas nada comprometedor. O serviço é gentil, há academia e uma boa sala com computadores e impressora (sem custo). O check-in e check-out é rápido e eficiente, assim como a contratação de transfer para aeroporto. 
Únicas ressalvas: se fechar a porta do banheiro para o banho o vapor sobe e volta para o piso e para sua cabeça; a água quente oscila de temperatura e as toalhas, embora em quantidade, são muito pequenas. Mas não só recomendo como voltaria a me hospedar nesse hotel. Especialmente bom para quem viaja com filhos, sejam eles crianças ou adolescentes.

title: buono
text:
camera immensa con divani e tavolo. cucina con tutto il necessario.
lato interno non si sente alcun rumore.
la moquette è datata ma pulita ogni giorno.

contro: il bagno è microscopico e sarebbe da rifare (non c'è nemmeno il miscelatore nella doccia ma i due vecchi rubinetti, la tenda era però nuova).
nonostante avessi spento l'a/c, c'era quella centralizzata che diciamo non era di mio gradimento ma non la solita temperatura polare americana.

title: Limpio, comodo y agradable
text:
El hotel esta perfectamente ubicado. Me hospede en un departamento para 4 personas, con una habitacion. Estabamos muy comodas las 4, era amplio y con todo lo necesario para una estadia de 10 dias en NY-
La cocina estaba completa con todo lo necesario, cafetera, tostadora, microondas e incluso lavavajillas. Las camas eran muy comodas, y las almohadas tambien. Aire acondicionado en los dos ambientes. 
No proporcionan desayuno y tampoco hay un restoran en el hotel, pero no es necesario ya que en el departamento tenes todo lo necesario para comer. 
La unica critica es que el WIFI gratis esta disponible solo en el lobby, si queres Wifi en la habitacion tiene un costo extra de 9USD x dia. 
Fuera de eso, todo estuvo muy bien, la ducha tira agua con fuerza y buena temperatura, toda la habitacion en general estaba siempre muy limpia, al igual que el resto del hotel. El personal super amable  y atento a todas nuestras necesidades. 
Lo recomiendo totalmente.

title: Loved the Murray Hill East Suites
text: Great value!  The location is excellent.  It was clean, orderly, and convenient.  It is not a glitzy place with amenities like a restaurant/bar, but the staff is cordial and we felt safe and secure.  We were upgraded for no apparent reason, but ended up with a large suite (separate BR, LR, kitchen, bath) with a terrace we really didn't use (no view except for large buildings).  It is the best value I have ever received in Manhattan!

title: Excelente localização
text: Este aparte hotel fica muito bem localizado, perto dos pontos turísticos de NY. Além disso, tem um mercado excelente muito perto, farmácia, bares e restaurantes, sem contar com a proximidade da Grand Station. É limpo e confortável, além de disponibilizarem, a pedido, microondas e grill. A cozinha é completa, pequena, mas suficiente. Os quartos são amplos e o atendimento gentil. Indico é certamente voltarei, pois o custo benefício é muito bom.

title: Amplio, confortable y muy bien ubicado
text:
Si usted quiere estar en el corazón del midtown de NYC, en un amplio departamento, equipado con todo lo que necesita en una casa, esta es una excelente opción!.
Viajamos con nuestras dos hijas y nos alojamos 4 días en este hotel. Un departamento de unos 50 m2, con amplio living comedor con sofa-cama para las nenas y un dormitorio con cama king size. Cocina separada con lavavajillas incluido, cafetera, microondas, cocina, horno y vajilla completa. 4 placares y baño completo. Todo limpio, en perfecto funcionamiento, buenas sabanas y toallas. Servicio diario de mucama, limpio. La decoración es clásica, sobria; no espere diseño y las ultimas tendencias... Sólo tiene internet en la recepción. El personal es amable y dispuesto a ayudar. La ubicación es extraordinaria, especialmente para quien va por primera vez a NYC. A 3 cuadras de la Grand Central Station, a 3 cuadras de Bryant Park y la Public Library, a 3 cuadras de la Quinta Avenida y podría numerar cantidad de atracciones que se pueden visitar caminando a no más de 20 minutos: Rockefeller Center, Empire State, Flatiron, Central Park, MoMa, Naciones Unidas...entre otros. Su tarifa es acorde a sus prestaciones. Muy recomendable.

title: Excelente
text: Fuimos dos veces a este hotel, tiene una excelente ubicación ya que queda cerca del midtown y de la centro término, demás de todo el comfort que se necesita para estar cómodo durante toda l estdia en la grn mnn, volveríamos. Ir un tercer ve, muy recomendable .

title: Would 100% Stay Again
text:
I was skeptical at first when my boyfriend booked this via priceline for our 3 days in NYC during a roadtrip of the East Coast. I'm a high maintenance traveler, having only stayed at the NYC Hilton before this trip, and had every doubt in the world. A cheap place to stay in the city? There had to be a catch. There wasn't one at ALL! When we arrived, we were given a free upgrade to a junior suite, and a coupon for a nearby parking deck for $25 a day (which if you aren't aware, is a HUGE discount for NYC parking). While we parked our car, they even took our bags up to our room for us. The building is equipped with a 24 hour doorman, which added to the security of the hotel.
The room was huge, with a queen size bed, living room, kitchen, and bathroom with a tub. It was bigger than most NYC apartments. The hotel does not use electronic keys, but we had no trouble getting the door open with a traditional key. The location is prime, within walking distance to almost everything and only about two blocks away from grand central station if you need a train to get you where you need to go. We walked to the empire state building, times square, and the flatiron district, never spending more than 30 minutes walking to any of the main tourist destinations we wanted to see. While the hotel doesn't offer breakfast, we were two blocks away from a Pret location, where we had delicious and cheap breakfast every morning.
We always came home to a clean room and a made up bed. We were on the second floor, so the street traffic did get a bit loud sometimes, but we were in such a secluded area this was a rare occasion. 
I would 100% stay here again. My boyfriend and I both agreed that this was our favorite place we stayed during our trip. I loved this hotel and would recommend it to anyone wanting to travel to NYC on a budget!

title: Great long weekend in NYC
text: This hotel was wonderful.  It's location is located close to many great restaurants, grocery stores, and walking distance to Central Park , the UN, and Grand Central Station.  Rooms are comfortably large and staff is friendly and helpful.  I am excited to go back to NYC to see more sites and plan to stay here again.

title: CLEAN, surprisingly roomy, great location
text: The typical tourist would love this hotel. It isn't a la-di-da expensive, luxurious hotel, but a comfortable, CLEAN place to relax after a busy day of sightseeing. The location can't be beat and the price wasn't outrageous. I'd be tempted to give it five stars if it had free Wi-Fi. It's the roomiest place we've stayed in during visits to the city. The kitchenette is serviceable and the closets are OK, except for the lack of hangers. The staff was very friendly and helpful. IMPORTANT TIP: Bring your own hair dryer. I'm used to hotels having functioning ones and left mine at home. The one in our room seemed to have been from the Eisenhower administration, with the velocity and heat of someone whistling. But that is a small flaw. I just didn't come prepared. I'd definitely stay there again!

title: Große Zimmer, gut gelegen
text:
Die Zimmer haben eine nette Größe, viel Platz. Die Küchenzeile ist ausreichend ausgestattet, wir haben aber nur den Kühlschrank genutzt. 
Man kann von dort alles gut zu Fuß erreichen, in 5 Minuten ist man an der Grand Central Station, in 15 Minuten am Times Square.

title: Excelente hotel
text: El hotel es muy bueno, las habitaciones con muy amplias y confortables. Esta ubicado en pleno centro de Manhattan, muy cerca de  la 5ta. Avenida y está todo al alcance de la mano. El personal del hotel es muy amable, servicial y bilingüe.

title: Excellent location, great value
text: Can't have everything and to get this location, it was an outstanding option. Within walking distance to many attractions and Grand Central. Street side room was noisy, even with white noise machine we had to "drown out" the activity on the street. Laundry facilities (thankfully), fitness room with a good selection of equipment, free WiFi only in the lobby, parking garage easily available. Sofa bed is "regular" size.  Kitchenette was tiny, but functional and met our needs. Must request microwave and toaster if you want but oven works fine. No exhaust fan in bathroom, so after several people take showers, H2O beaded on the ceiling. A/C worked great. Would consider staying there again.

title: Recomendable
text:
Hotel muy buena ubicacion, cerca de Central Station, tiene transporte al aeropuerto.
Esta ubicado cerca de las Naciones Unidas, y tambien de la Biblioteca Nacional, hitos de Nueva York.
Muy cerca de un supermarket, 
Buena disposición de todo el personal,  aseo bueno.

title: Una de las mejores ubicaciones en NYC
text: Hotel sin grande pretensiones pero una ubicación excelente. Cercano a 5Th ave., Lexington y fundamentalmente a Grand Central. Amplias habitaciones , Baños con las medidas necesarias para ser cómodo. Cocina totalmente equipada para el que desee comer ahí. Vasos platos,cubiertos etc.y siempre te o café para desayunar.Lo único objetable es la atención de algunos empleados.Buenos placards y muebles.Buena limpieza y buena ubicación para llegar de noche después del teatro o cine.Para recomendar y elegir sin dudarlo..

title: Decent Place to Stay with Great Location
text: Not a bad option for the price we paid. The suites were spacious, although very dated. Our junior suite could have easily slept about 5 people, comfortably. The suite also contained a kitchenette area, although there was no microwave, toaster, or can opener. The coffee maker looked like it had seen better days. The room was pretty clean, but the carpet was a little sticky. The bathroom was small but manageable. Location is great! Customer service was excellent. We were upgraded to a junior suite without having to ask. I would stay again if I had to.

title: Outstanding value and location
text: Top notch value close by everything with easy access to Grand Central Station. Quiet, tree-lined block with plenty of excellent restaurants nearby. Whether one is staying overnight or a week or more, Murray Hill East offers outstanding comfort at an affordable price.

title: Murryhill East Suite 2014
text:
Still a great place, great location, 3 blocks from Grand Central Station and centrally situated for walking in every direction with shops, bars, banks, restaurants, etc, all within one block.

We had requested a Studio suite but was upgraded to a 1 bedroom suite (Room 905) on check in at no extra cost. The kitchenette was sparsely equipped and I expected a toaster as standard, but there wasn't one.

Wireless is free in the reception area but you pay $8.99 daily or $60 for a month for usage in your suite. Those are the only two tariffs available, nothing in between so as we were staying for 7 nights, the monthly option was the obvious choice.
Been charged for wi-fi as a hotel guest is quite a bugbear with me, it shouldn't happen and it will increasingly be a factor in choosing accommodation.
Before you subscribe to wireless service in your suite, do a scan to see if there are any free services within range. If I had done so, I would have saved myself $60, just be aware that these networks are not secure so be careful of any data sent or received. For financial transactions, be sure that your web connection is the encrypted htpps rather than http or your sent and received data will be in clear text.

The suite only had a TV in the sitting room and none in the bedroom but as we had only requested a Studio suite originally, we couldn't really complain, it was perfect for the two us and was serviced daily.

The hotel concierge and front desk staff are very friendly and just let you get on with your vacation without any unwarranted intrusion.

If you book transport via the front desk, especially to and from JFK airport, be sure to check with the hotel on the rate you will be charged, currently $65 including tolls for a town car or similar, tipping is at you discretion but $3-5 is not unreasonable, I'm told.

We will be back next year unless there are drastic changes in price and quality.

title: Best buy
text:
I have been so many times to New York and have been living in different hotels. What you learn is that there very often is no connection between price and quality.
This is the hotel I would like to  stay in - in the future - after the experience I had with them three nights.
Yes, it is old. Yes, they have no breakfast. 
But the suite/the rooms are clean, spotless and very comfortably. It is extremely quiet here, and the elevator is always there or coming very soon. And just around any corner you have breakfast restaurants, all kinds of restaurants. You are in the middle of everything.
I love this hotel.

title: Good location, but bad service
text: The good thing about this hotel is that it is located next to the Grand Central Station, not only a touristic place, but also a metro sation, wich makes it easy to go to other parts of the city. Also, it is in a walking distance from other places as the Empire State Building, 5th Avenue and Times Square. The bad thing is that the staff is not very friendly and it is difficult to have your room changed if you have any problems. Also, as there are kitchens with no ventilation inside the apartments, the frying smells come from other apartments and stinks all over the floor. For the price, I considered it expensive, as everything in Manhattan.

title: Ótima localização
text: Fiquei hospedado neste hotel que fica muito bem localizado, próximo a Central Station e a muitos outros pontos importantes e turísticos de NY. O hotel possui uma decoração um pouco antiga, mas o atendimento é excelente, os quartos são espaçosos. Fiquei no apartamento da cobertura com mais 2 amigos (sala, quarto e cozinha completa) com uma diária imbatível ainda mais considerando-se que estávamos em Manhattan. Existem bons restaurantes e um supermercado perto, o que permite economizar na alimentação.

title: Gute Lage und saubere Zimmer
text:
Wir waren drei Tage in den Murray Hill East Suites und waren sehr zufrieden. Auch wenn unser Zimmer schon in die Jahre gekommen ist, war alles sauber. Das Zimmer war riesig und die Lage in New York sehr gut. Man ist sofort an der Central Station, das Empire State Building ist auch nicht weit weg und der Time Square ebenfalls. 
Wir würden wieder dort übernachten.

title: 4 dages børneferie
text: Super fint hotel til overnatning med børn :) Ikke et super moderne køkken, men indeholder det nødvendige. Pæne, rene værelser og god service :) max 5 min gang fra Grand Central, 2 min til autentisk amerikansk morgenmads diner. Var i øvrigt kun på hotellet til overnatning - NY har så meget at byde på! Ville helt klart overnatte der igen.

title: Muy recomendable!! excelente ubicación.
text:
estuve del 23 de mayor al 3 de junio en el murray hill east (no confundir con uno de similar nombre que hay en las cercanías, murray hill house creo).
si uno no busca lujos se va a encontrar con un apart confortable, yo estuve en un estudio que tenía una cocina pequeña pero equipada con lo necesario, un lugar para comer o desayunar, un sofá grande y uno individual muy cómodos, un televisor pantalla plana, cama amplia con buen colchón y buenas almohadas y el baño con bañera amplio y equipamiento completo.
el personal en su mayoría en mayor o menor medida habla español, todos muy dispuestos a evacuar dudas y solucionar problemas, especialmente santa, una chica que habla perfecto español y es extraordinariamente atenta y agradable.
la ubicación para mi gusto no podía ser mejor. a unas 4 cuadras de la gran estación y menos de diez minutos caminando de time square, 25 minutos del central park y así de las mayorías de atracciones de manhattan, ya que según mi opinión y experiencia, nueva york hay que conocerla caminando porque es sorprendente a cada cuadra, quien no pueda hacerlo el hotel está cerca para tomar metros que son excelentes y van para todos lados.
el lugar es tranquilo y el hotel tambien, no hay colas en los ascensores ni nada por el estilo.
dicen que las habitaciones al frente son un poco ruidosas, pero la calle 39 por la noche no es muy transitada así que creo no sería algo grave, pero más tranquilo seguro son las que dan al fondo.
yo volvería por supuesto y lo recomiendo

title: Bom hotel
text: O que mais me surpreendeu neste hotel foi o tamanho da suíte. Precisa de uma reforma? Sim, a decoração é antiga, parece que vc voltou no tempo. Mas a limpeza é impecável e o espaço do quarto compensa. Além disso, a localização dele é ótima, pertinho da Grand Central Station, dá para fazer muita coisa a pé. Além disso o bairro é bem charmoso, em alguns momentos me senti até uma "insider". Ponto NEGATIVO: o wi-fi só é grátis na recepção, então fica bem concorrido conseguir um lugar lá. Mas para quem faz passeio o dia todo e só quer relaxar quando chega à noite isso nem faz tanta diferença. Recomendo!

title: Spacious clean budget hotel in New York.
text: Okay so it's not brand new and fitments are rather dated but for clean, spacious accommodation in a great location I would highly recommend this hotel. All staff were friendly and helpful. We were 4 friends sharing and had two rooms plus well equipped kitchen and bathroom. Two double beds and one king sized comfortable bed settee meant two had to share but no great hardship. Loads of space meant we weren't on top of each other. I would happily stay here again.

title: spacious, convenient location
text: We stayed at this 'suites' hotel in mid-may 2014.  Rooms were large, cleaned daily. There were plenty of local shops and eateries.  When we were there they were experiencing an early hot spell and the air-conditioning didn't really work which made the nights uncomfortable as if you opened the windows the noise of the street would keep you awake.  But by the second week the air-conditioning magically started to work so I can only assume that during the cold weather that same system is used for heating.  When the weather heats up they must switch it to cold.  Our loo flooded the first night but this was promptly fixed.  Yes the decor is tired but this is more than made up for by the size of the rooms.  No free wi-fi in room which is irritating but I am sure if the rooms were re-decorated and wi-fi provided then the nightly cost would be higher.  We paid $305 for one bedroom with two queen beds, living room with sofa bed, kitchenette and bathroom.  We were 3 adults but the suite could have slept 6.  Yes I would definately use this hotel again.

title: Buon soggiorno in una città fantastica!
text: Buona la posizione, l'hotel si trova a pochi minuti dalla Grand Central e da molte altre attrazioni turistiche, per esempio in dieci minuti circa si arriva a Times Square. Le stanze sono dei veri e propri mini appartamenti con angolo cottura. Le pulizie vengono fatte tutti i giorni e in modo accurato. Lo consiglierei sicuramente a chiunque dovesse recarsi in questa fantastica città. Io me ne sn letteralmente innamorata!

title: Excellent location. No free wi fi.
text: Well, my room was great and big. Location is very good.  However, by the price of this hotel they should provide free wi if to all its customers. There are usually a lot of people in the lobby area using the only spot of free wi fi in the whole hotel building.

title: An excellent place in Manhattan
text:
My wife and I stayed here for five nights in early May. We booked it through priceline.com and got a good deal. When we checked in we were upgraded to a junior suite which is basically a one bedroom flat with a lounge cum dining area, a bedroom with queen bed and a kitchenette. The kitchenette comes with a fridge, microwave, electric stove and basic utensils. The decor may be dates but the room had everything that one needed, especially a large space.
The location is very convenient, on 39th East and Lex. Lexington is full of restaurants and shops that makes the lack of a restaurant in the hotel a non-event. There is a Starbucks a block away.
Overall a very pleasant experience.

title: Hotel bien situado y amplias habitaciones.
text:
Hotel en Manhattan bien situado, muy cercano al edificio de las Naciones Unidas y a pocos minutos andando de la estación Grand Central. Nos alojamos en una suite, muy amplia, con salón (con sofá cama) y cocina independiente (incluye lavavajillas). Dispone de caja fuerte que recomiendo encarecidamente utilizar (no es nada aconsejable dejar objetos de valor fuera de ella).
El hotel es un poco antiguo y no dispone de wifi gratuito en las habitaciones (si en recepción). El personal es atento y la mayoría entiende el castellano.

title: Very good location,clean hotel and nice room!!!
text: We stayed at this apartment hotel on our first trip to New York.Our room was so spacious,it was basically something like a very spacious one bedroom apartment.The location was just  perfect!Very close to 5th avenue,Times Square,Empire state building...The room was very clean and the housekeepers kept it clean everyday.I will definitely come back!

title: good location
text:
We stayed at this apartment hotel after New years. This hotel is very cozy and spacious for New York. It doesnt provide any amenities, but you are in NYC. We had a cozy queen size bed, our suite had a small kitchen, and a good size lounge area. The decor is a bit out dated, but the room was clean. It is a great value for friends or families even. You are 3 blocks away from Grand Central and the 5th Avenue. Time square is also close by. Subway is 5 minute walk, and there are restaurants and venues close by. Would recommend this hotel to anyone.

trust me i was a NYC tour guide

title: Muy recomendable
text: La ubicación del apart es excelente. Se puede ir caminando a muchas de las atracciones de Manhattan y en metro desde la Grand Central (tres cuadras) a todo NY. El apartamento muy confortable, con mucho espacio, camas cómodas y la ventaja de una cocina completa. A la vuelta por la 3rd. Av hay un supermercado donde se puede comprar todo para un buen desayuno en el hotel. El personal muy atento en especial las chicas que estaban en la recepción y hablan perfecto español y el portero Robert, muy atento. Obviamente es muy caro comparando con otra ciudades, pero es New York! todo es caro...creo que de todas maneras esta opción supera a hoteles que se ofrecen por el mismo precio.

title: Good Location, Clean Suite
text:
I was booked into here for 5 nights recently while working in midtown.   Location is excellent,  3 blocks from Grand Central.  Lots of restaurants close by.   Check-in and check-out was fast and hassle free.   My suite was on 4th floor and was large and spacious.  Everything worked as expected.   Plenty of clean towels.  

Furniture was cheapish and slightly tired looking.  No air conditioning however - only heating/cooling vents in the kitchen and bathroom.   I always felt cold in bed because , while there were plenty of pillows, there was only one thin blanket provided.

Wifi was free in the lobby - otherwise it was $8.99/day or $59.99/month in the suite.  No weekly rate.

title: Great stay, great location
text: We had one night at the hotel. Despite some of the furnishings looking a little tired, the room was very clean. The location was excellent and having a kitchenette was great. Great room for the price.

title: Surprisingly Pleased! Very Happy!
text:
I am going to be honest, I was led to this hotel via a last minute Hotwire reservation and was very nervous. As you can see there are mixed reviews all over the internet for this hotel. I am sort of a hotel snob and am very afraid of taking home little critters from hotels. I was skeptical of Murray Hill East, but boy was I wrong!! I really liked this hotel. It was clean, bug free and super convenient.

When I arrived, the man at the front desk informed me that my room had been upgraded. I don't know why but I appreciated it! My room was on the third floor and was beautifully quaint. Dark carpets and furniture, but clean white sheets and blankets. I always check hotel beds for bugs before using it and there were no signs of life...what a relief! Seriously, I was ecstatic at the cleanliness of the room. It reminded me of staying in my grandmothers old apartment in NYC. I stayed by myself, but there was enough room for multiple people. I did not use the kitchen for anything but it also appeared clean although a little old.

My room did not look like many of the photos. I added some as it looked way more up to date than many of the pictures others added. Perhaps this is the difference between an upgrade and a regular renovation. I am thinking that they have updated some but not all of the rooms and I got lucky with the upgrade.

Overall, I am very happy with my stay and very thankful to Murray Hill East Suites for making a last minute trip to NYC stress free for me. I would definitely recommend it and stay there again.

Things to be mindful of:
-It is NYC...it will be loud. I feel asleep with the (HD) Television on to try to drown out the sound.
-The provide shampoo, lotion and soap but no conditioner!
-The hair dryer is very outdated. It had about the same power as a public bathroom hair dryer. I had wet hair for the whole day.

title: Очень понравилось там
text:
Отличный отель с удобным расположением.
Понравился большой номер: кухня с плитой, чайником, холодильником и всей необходимой посудой; гостиная с диваном и тв; спальня с большой удобной кроватью.
Большие шкафы, много тумбочек, есть утюг, внизу есть прачечная самообслуживания (стирка-2$, сушка-2$), небольшой спортзал.  
Уборка хорошая и регулярная.
Единственный минус, что бесплатный интернет только в лобби, но в Нью-Йорке у нас везде так было.

title: I love this Hotel
text:
Excellent location, we had a one bedroom was very spacious.  Nice kitchen and living area.  It is great if you don't like to eat out every meal...

I wish we could have stayed there this last trip.... Got very pricey.

title: Great location
text: As our  son now lives in New York we are regular visitors.We have found these well located serviced apartments with a fully functioning kitchen loctaed right in mid town.They are a bit tired but are well priced and have everything we need.We have just styed there for a week and have already booked for our next trip in December.Makes our stays in N ew York special.Only improvement would be to have free WiFi in the rooms not just in the lobby

title: Ideal para familias
text: Bien ubicado, personal amable, decorado tal cual aparece en las fotos, wi fi gratis en el lobby, supermercado a la vuelta y lo mejor: ambientes muy espaciosos (dos ambientes con baño y cocina con alrededor de 30-35m2) para NY. Buena opción para lo que quieren ahorrar en desayunos y cenas. La única contra: me toco un departamento al frente y no tiene doble vidrio x lo tanto un poco ruidoso

title: Great value !
text: Stayed 16 - 23 March. Very convenient location. Staff friendly & helpful. Room was spacious & comfortable. Bathroom modern - plenty of hot water.  Maid service brilliant.  Kitchen area is a real asset !  Would definitely recommend !

title: Posizione strategica!
text:
Bella struttura in pieno centro di Manhattan. In pochi minuti a piedi si possono raggiungere moltissime attrazioni: Grand Central Station, ONU, Chrysler Building, 5th Avenue, NY Public Library, Bryant Park, Times Square, Morgan Library, Empire State Building...
L'appartamento comprende un'ampia stanza che fa da salone e camera da letto, il bagno e la cucina.
Molto pulito e in più rifanno la stanza tuti i giorni cambiando anche gli asciugamani (e se lasciate i piatti sporchi li troverete lavati!).
Personale competente e gentile, dalla reception, al concièrge alle donne delle pulizie.
Unici punti negativi: il wi-fi è gratuito solo nella lobby (e con quello che si fanno pagare potrebbero fare lo sforzo di includerlo gratuitamente nelle camere) e la cucina che bisognerebbe svecchiarla (se però come noi l'usate solo per la colazione e riscaldare i cibi take away va benissimo).
Chiedere una camera sul retro per un po' più di tranquillità (ricordatevi comunque che siete a Manhattan...).
Sicuramente da consigliare!

title: dark small fuggy room
text:
very cheep and bad hotel, but a good location. i was staying there for 10 days. suffering wishout wifi in the room, only in the small lobby on the ground floor.
rooms are dark and uncomfortable.
with old smell of long time smoking

title: Excelente
text:
a 3 cuadras de grand central, muy amables, hablan castellano, portero toda la noche.
calefaccion en cada ambiente individual, muy buena ducha y limpio.
podes comprar en supermercado y llevar a tu cocina

title: Really nice if not really staying long
text:
I stayed here last week due to T A advice.
I have been looking for a lodging nearby to deal with my father's acute illness on the UES.
I was pleasantly surprised with this place and would return if need be.

Everything was clean. The bed was very comfortable.
The street last week was reasonably quiet and I was on the 2nd floor, in the front!!!!!

Definitely not for tourist groups,, thank goodness.

Full kitchens are not equipped for long stay, in my opinion. But , please note, full refrigerator had ice trays and made ice.
Minimal, I mean REALLY minimal cookware and utensils. Maybe more can be had if you ask. I did not.
No paper towels!!!!!!!  No soap!  This really bothered me.

Towels are very spare. I would be embarrassed to offer them in my house to my guests. Shampoo/etc not adequate for two.

But it was definitely more than OK, and the price was good.
The front desk was very pleasant.

title: Excelente opcion
text:
El hotel tiene una ubicación magnifica, sobte todo si tienes que realizará actividades en Midtown o cerca de las Naciones Unidas.
Yo tome una habitación single que era muy confortsble, con una cama Queen size, buenas almohadas y la remperatura agradable. Estuve alli 10 días por trabajo
Está muy bien equipada y de buenas dimensiones. El baño era pequeño pero adecuado, y la cocina, equipada con lo necesario, resultó más de lo que esperaba.
Si bien el servicio e wifi es de pago en las habitaciones, si te vas a quedar varios días conviene pagar el abono que resulta mucho más barato y práctico que hacerlo día por día. El servicio es gratuito en el lobby del hotel, pero este espscio es muy reducido y no resulta adecuado para concentrarse.
En un radio de dos calles del hotel hay al menos dos supermercados muy bien surtidos, si es que que has de aprovechar la cocina y su heladera.  
El personal es muy atento y eficiente sin ser invasivo
El barrio es kuy agradable y tranquilo y estas cerca de todo...
Lo recomiendo.
El per

title: Превосходно!
text:
Единственный отель за все время путешествий, который превзошел все ожидания! 
наткнулась на очень удачное предложение по стоимости, при 100% предоплате, решила рискнуть, т.к. отзывы в основном были только положительные.
Номер был очень большой, много вешалок в гардеробе, что является очень большим плюсом для девушек =) Обычно в отелях по 5-6 плечиков максимум, что маловато для 2х девушек в номере.
Состояние номеров конечно не идеально, можно найти к чему придраться, но общее впечатление от ремонта осталось положительным.
Также к минусам можно отнести платный вайфай в номерах, но он всегда бесплатный в лобби.
Также в холодное время года в номерах очень холодно, приходится включать обогреватель, что очень пересушивает воздух в помещении.
Из плюсов - всегда чисто, ненавящивый клининг, супер удобные кровати, близкое расположение к основным турист. местам, а также метро.
Определенно рекомендую к посещению.

title: Large, clean and inexpensive
text: This hotel is very reasonably priced. The size of these rooms are another story -they r huge.  Our room even had a huge balcony - it was a great surprise - with a view of the Empire State Building.  The hotel is not completely up to date but it's not old either.  It's seriously a hidden gem.  Shhhhh.......

title: Good location
text: This was our second time in New York and we decided to pay a little more and stay centrally.  New York is NOT a cheap place for accommodation so, for us, it was an expensive three nights but it could have been miles worse.  The location was excellent being walking distance to Central Station,UN building, Tudor City, Public Library etc.  There was also a supermarket nearby plus many other places to buy takeaway food.  On arrival I had specifically requested a toaster so, instead of giving us one, they upgraded us to a suite with separate bedroom and separate kitchen which we made the most of.  It was lovely to be able to spread out a bit.  We did have a bit of trouble lighting the gas stove but maintenance eventually came and sorted it out - and we found our missing cutlery and plates clean in the dishwasher!  The laundromat was very efficient - good dryer.  There were several public computers for free in a business room which was locked for some hours at night.  I found the pillows too high for what I am used to so put some towells in a pillowcase and used that instead.  If we ever return to New York I would definitely like to stay here again.

title: Buena Ubicación
text: La ubicación es lo mas destacado del hotel, estuvimos en septiembre con mi esposa y si bien no hacia tanto calor el aire no funciono en toda la estadía, teníamos que dormir con las ventanas abierta y a las siete de la mañana empezaban los obreros de las obras cercanas con sus maquinas. Nadie supo dar una respuesta satisfactoria, ni ahí de una atención para compensar. Tengan cuidado, por lo que leí tienen problemas de climatizacion en verano y en invierno.

title: Muy buena experiencia
text:
El primer aspecto que me preocupaba era la ubicación. Como fue mi primer viaje a NY tenía muchas dudas, pero todo comenzó a clarificarse con la llegada al hotel. Es recomendable llegar en subte desde el JFK hasta la grand central station y luego caminar unos 300 metros hasta el hotel.

La llegada fue antes del horario de ingreso, pero la recepcionista me dejó hacer el check in sin problemas, poder dejar las maletas y salir a recorrer la ciudad.

Las habitaciones son muy amplias, limpias y con todas las comodidades de un muy buen hotel en Argentina. La cocina la usé poco pero noté que faltaban algunos elementos.

El único punto negativo del hotel se lo lleva el personal, no por la falta de servicio sino porque tienen un trato bastante frío y distante al menos tratandose de que van muchos latinos al hotel. Igualmente siempre respondieron a mis solicitudes y lo más importante para muchas personas es que la mayoría habla español, salvo un señor que estaba por las noches pero de muy buena predisposición.

Lo recomiendo categoricamente.

title: Muy buen hotel, buena ubicacion. Volveria
text:
Estuvimos en familia en febrero de 2014 en los departamentos de MH.
Los departamentos cómodos, espaciosos, confortables, bien equipados (ropa blanca, vajilla y electrodomésticos). El personal del hotel muy amable y servicial, todos son bilingües (ingles-español).
Tiene una muy buena ubicación ya que la Estación Central esta a 3 cuadras y desde ahí podes ir a cualquier lugar de Manhatan. Zona segura. A la vuelta del hotel esta el supermercado D'agostino con precios normales y comida preparada, abierto hasta pasadas las 22:00.
100% recomendable, VOLVERÍA.

title: VICINO A TUTTO..
text: Comodo vicino al palazzo delle nazioni unite e al centro.Ottimi ristoranti in zona e se sei stanco puoi cucinarti qualcosa c'e' un angolo cottura fornitissimo. Camere immense personale molto efficiente e gentile.Ci sono tornato un paio di volte.Usciti dall'albergo ti viene voglia di incamminarti a piedi sei veramente vicino a tutto.

title: Vraiment bien !
text: Idéalement situé, personnel très sympa, chambres faites tous les jours. Simple mais très chouette. Voyage familial pour une semaine. Matériel de cuisine de base mais cela suffit. Linge de toilette changé ts les jours. A recommander.

title: Very clean a drink reasonable priced
text: I would definitely recommend the Murray hill suites if staying when visiting new york.  My daughter and I have just returned from a five night stay and cannot fault these apartments.  We found everyone at the Front desk very helpful and the premises very clean with towels changed daily.  The area is safe with plenty of eateries near by.  Walking distance to times square, Grand central station, empire state building and 5th avenue. I am returning to NY at in the summer and had booked a hotel downtown but now I have visited here I have changed the booking to stay at Murray hill.

title: Ótimo hotel!
text: uma ótima surpresa. o hotel é muito bem localizado perto da central station. Um supermercado bem próximo o faz economizar uma boa grana, pois o hotel possui cozinha completa e muito bem montada. o quarto é muito amplo, muito mesmo, tv, aquecimento e staff muito atencioso. com certeza ficarei lá outra vez.

title: Decent price, friendly staff
text:
The desk staff and doorman were very friendly. All desk staff we came in contact with were bilingual. The room was clean with a spacious living and sleeping area. The bathroom was a bit cramped. My arm kept hitting the paper holder despite my not being any bigger than 'average' size. The mattress could use changing. Anytime my husband got into the bed, it sounded like a spring popped. We had forgotten our toothbrushes so I enquired at the desk. Other than soap, shampoo and body lotion they do not have any toiletries. There is an overpriced convenience store/deli on the corner they will suggest for any forgotten items.
After inquiring about forgotten toiletries, I mentioned that someone had vomited in the elevator. The desk attendee stated they were aware and had notified housekeeping. More than 30 minutes later as we were checking out it still had not been cleaned.

title: Clean with an incredible door man
text: Stayed here in mid January. Very clean with great daily housekeeping staff. It depends what you are looking for......it is very dated but also spacious...comfortable beds....desk staff are luke warm ...but the door man/bell hop/everything man (tall Polish man) is amazing...we had contact with him upon check in and for the rest of our 4 night stay and he was more gracious each time...they are very lucky to have!!!!

title: Muito bom
text: Estivemos no hotel em fevereiro de 2014. O sistema de aquecimento foi muito eficiente. A cozinha é excelente para quem pretende economizar um pouco fazendo alguma refeição em casa. O apartamento é amplo e confortável. A localização é estratégica, está a 3 quadras da Grand Central Station e para quem não se importa em caminhar mais outras 3 quadras, próximo do Empire State e da Times Square. Os funcionários sempre foram muito solícitos e educados. Recomendo! Certamente ficaria lá novamente.

title: Muito bom
text: O hotel está bem localizado, dá pra fazer basicamente tudo a pé, tem alguns restaurantes e mercado perto. Os quartos na verdade são aptos, com cozinha compacta, mas completa, sala e quarto bem grandes. O hotel tem carinha de antigo, mas é bem limpo, e tem funcionários educados e solícitos. Gostei muito, recomendo, e com certeza ficaria lá novamente!

title: By New York city standards, this place is reasonably priced!
text: We were in New York City for a concert on Thursday night. This hotel was walking distance from Grand Central terminal. I admit that I had reservations when booking it because the price was so reasonable. Let's just say I was happy when I found out how nice the accommodations were. Although we did not get to use it, for an extended stay the kitchenette would be wonderful. The room included a queen size bed and a pullout couch. Both of them were very comfortable.

title: Vraiment Génial ;-)
text:
Tres bonne hôtel ! Super bien situé, a peine a 5mn du métro a pied. 

Chambre très spacieuse (rare pour NYC) et vraiment agréable & très propre !

Nous avons vraiment été agréablement surpris et nous reviendrons sans nul doute dans cette hôtel !

Les employés était agréable et disponible !

title: Aceptable
text: El departamento era más que cómodo, la limpieza también cumplió. La ubicación no es nada mala, caminando algunas cuadras ya te podes acercar a distintos lugares interesantes de la ciudad. Faltaba mas simpatía en la gente del hotel, balance aceptable.

title: Hotel que brinda espacio y confort
text:
Alquilamos un apartamento para nuestra familia de 6 personas. 
Muy cómodo, espacioso, habitaciones grandes, muchísimos placares, bien calefaccionado, cocina compelta, televisores en todos los cuartos y living. Living muy grande. 
Muy limpio. Siempre cambiaban sabanas y toallas.
Recepcionista 24 hs. 
Ubicado cerca de todo en 149 East 39th Street y Lexington Ave.
Vale la pena!!
Alfredo Ahuad

title: Excelente localização
text: Pedimos a uma prima que morou em New York que nos indicasse um hotel que tivesse preço acessível, mas que fosse bem localizado pois estávamos viajando com duas crianças. A dica foi excelente. Murray Hill East Suites fica em ponto estrategico, estávamos perto de várias atrações como o Empire State, inclusive, fomos ao Central Park fazendo caminhada (cerca de 12 quadras), as crianças adoraram pois no caminho, passamos pela loja da Lego no Rockefeller Center, American Girl Place e outros. Voltaremos, com certeza.

title: Cuidado con la seguridad
text: La zona del hotel es linda y segura. El hotel tiene grandes habitaciones con cocina, lo cual es muy conveniente. Solo hay internet en el lobby o te cobran mucho dinero por dia para tener internet en la habitacion, lo cual es poco conveniente para planificar los dias en NY. La caja de seguridad tambien es muy costosa y debido a eso, lamentablemente nos robaron dinero de nuestra valija. Llamamos a la policía, vinieron e hicieron un reporte. el oficial nos dijo que no era la primera vez que asistían al hotel por el mismo problema.  Asi que ojo!! Alguien del hotel estuvo revisando nuestro equipaje durante la estadia alli.

title: aceptable apart a buen precio en NYC
text:
Estuve con mi familia en Diciembre , reservamos 2 estudios . Es un apart sin mucho lujo y que ofrece  zona de cocina pero la misma no esta muy equipada faltan elementos para cocinar y aprovechar el horno, la helader es muy pequeña, escasa vajilla . 
No hay wifi libre en las habitaciones , solo en la zona del hall. La ubicación no es la ideal sobre todo porque no hay ninguna linea de subte muy cerca , en lineas generales está bien pero no mucho mas.

title: Un appartamento a Manhattan
text:
Ho soggiornato in questo Hotel, situato a Midtown Manhattan, nel agosto del 2013. Sono nativa di NY, ma abito in Italia da molti anni, per cui generalmente soggiorno a casa di parenti ed amici quando visito. Questa volta, venendo in compagnia, sono stata in un hotel. Il Murray Hill East Suites ti fa sentire come a casa tua. 
Le suite sono ampie, pulite, con due grandi letti comodissimi, divano e tutto l’arredamento di un monolocale, completo di tavolo e sedie. C’è un cucinino comodissimo fornito di frigo, fornelli e forno tradizionale, forno a microonde, stoviglie e piatti, se uno vuole cucinare. Troverete sempre il thè e caffè fresco accanto alla caffettiera! Ogni giorno viene pulito il bagno, cambiati gli asciugamani, rifornito il sapone, e pulita la cucina. C’è la cassaforte nel armadio accanto al ferro da stiro.
Nel seminterrato si trova una palestra ed una lavanderia dove potete lavare ed asciugare i vostri indumenti in pochissimo tempo.
Tutto lo staff, sveglio 24 ore su 24, è molto cordiale. Nella lobby, seduti sulle comode poltrone o divani, c’è Free WiFi.
Raccomando questo Hotel a tutte le persone che vogliono un assaggio della vita giornaliera a Manhattan!

title: Super Comodo
text: Abbiamo soggiornato x 5 notti al Murray Hill sentendoci come a casa nostra, Hotel pulito, confortevole con personale gentile, posizione ideale per raggiungere qualsiasi destinazione, avendo vicino la stazione centrale dei treni e metrò a 5 minuti (veri) a piedi, con qualche passo in più si raggiunge Time square .. etc..  Per chi ama andare in bici di fronte all'hotel c'è il noleggio bike. il nostro bilocale spazioso  e confortevole con cucinino piccolo ma completo di tutto e sopratutto abbiamo riposato nel silenzio senza rumori che la città offre in abbondanza... la prossima ci tornerei molto volentieri..

title: Normal
text: El hotel es normal, pensé que era mejor. Las instalaciones de la habitación son muy antiguas. La calefacción se rompió y estabamos en pleno invierno. La ubicación es excelente: a unas cuadras de la estación central. La recepcionista fue muy antipática.

title: Great location plenty of room!
text: Our family of four had plenty of space. Loved the den area for hanging out at night. We used the full kitchen for breakfast and snacks. Easy walk to grand central station, grocery store and convenience store. Highly recommend and get a terrace, great view!

title: FANTASTICO
text:
Ho soggiornato in questo Hotel la scorsa settimana. Sono stata tante volte a NY sia in appartamenti in casa di amici che in Hotel e devo dire che il Murray Hill è veramente di categoria, ti senti a tuo agio quasi come a casa.
L'hotel ha una posizione privilegiata in Midtown sulla 39° strada tra la 3rd e la Lexington, a due passi dalla stazione, dall'Empire, da Briant Park e Time Square, di facile accesso alla metro, ai bus ed ai vari ristoranti della zona.
Ha un bel ingresso con un piccolo soggiorno dove è presente la connessione internet. Il personale alla reception è molto gentile ed in particolare il doorman Hrant.
I mini appartamenti sono spaziosi, puliti e ben arredati ed anche il servizio interno in generale è molto buono.
Dotati di cucinino, con un bel soggiorno, io avevo un comodissimo letto King. Ogni giorno vengono cambiati gli asciugamani, rifornito il bagno di bagnoschiuma e sapone, e pulita la cucina.
Anche la moquette, che non amo particolarmente, era molto pulita. Le camere inoltre sono ben insonorizzate e le finestre isolanti che non ti fanno sentire i rumori di una città che non dorme mai.
Ci tornerò sicuramente e lo consiglio vivamente a tutti. Il prezzo è più alto di altri Hotel ma lo standard che offre è sicuramente superiore.

title: Preço justo e serviço de primeira...
text:
Acabei chegando nesse hotel meio que por acaso. Após ter uma experiência terrível no Days Inn North Bergen, reservei de um dia para o outro o primeiro hotel que vi disponível em Manhattan e me mudei logo cedo.
Logo que cheguei pude respirar aliviado, pois a atenção que me foi dispensada desde o primeiro momento já demonstrava a preocupação do staff em fazer o hospede se sentir bem. 
Cheguei mais cedo que o horário previsto de check-in. Prontamente eles se dispuseram a guardar minhas malas (quem viaja, sabe que não são todos hoteis q se dispõem a isso) sugeriram passeia, ofereceram, água, café e etc.
O quarto tem um mobiliário tradicional, que não é novo mais com uma aparência bem cuidada.
Banheiro não é uma espetáculo, contudo atendia muito bem.

title: A comfortable stay, lots of space in room
text:
Stayed here to attend a conference in summer 2013. Shared with my son who came along to do some sight seeing. Plenty of space in the rooms and the kitchen was very handy. Location was great for the subway and access to the rest of the city.
Only downside was that the internet access was not free.

title: Good deal
text: Plenty of room, fine mid-town location, tidy enough.  Front desk was a tad surly (and not entertaining NY-style surly) and promised us blankets that then turned out not to exist. An excellent deal, comfortable and convenient, certainly not luxurious.

title: Quiet, well located, comfortable and economic
text: Stayed with my son for a business trip to NY, and was pleased with what this place offers. Within walking distance to much of the NY sights. Good sized rooms with privacy for multiple guests. Small kitchen was functional and saves the need to go out for odd meals. Room was comfortable and warm. Some noise from a construction site a block behind - but much quieter than NY hotels on busy streets. Staff were pleasant and unobtrusive. Would recommend for value!

title: Volveria siempre
text: Estuvimos una semana con los chicos. La habitacion era espaciosa y la cocina completa(con lava vajilla). Tienen lavadero en el hotel y ña gente del front desk siempre se mostro atenta con nosotros. La ubicacion es genial: a un paso de la grand central, rodeado de negocios y en un barrio tranquilo. No tuvimos ningin inconveniente. Volveria sin dudarlo.

title: Not what I expected!
text: When I first saw pictures posted of this hotel I was a little disappointed that this was the hotel I won at Priceline's name your own price, but the hotel was great the room looked very nice, very comfortable and clean. The location is perfect, very close to most popular NY locations...I would definitely recommend this hotel.

title: bella posizione
text:
Ho soggiornato in questo hotel dal 2 al 10 novembre,
Posizione ottima e tranquilla vicino a supermercati,metro, ristoranti, a piedi si possono raggiungere in pochi minuti Empire, Fifth Avenue, Time Square,Grand Central ecc... monolocale molto spazioso  con cucina che però non era molto fornita di utensili e mancava la lavastoviglie che però è prevista in altre tipologie di stanze quindi meglio specificare prima, comunque la donna delle pulizie provvedeva a lavare le stoviglie e a portare via l'immondizia tutti i giorni e anche gli asciugamani venivano cambiati giornalmente, portieri e addetti alla reception molto gentili sempre pronti a dare un'aiuto o informazioni, in particolare Mr. Rhunt.
 Nota negativa è l'arredamento obsoleto e il wifi solo nella hall che rovina il discorso qualità-prezzo,
infine per che scrive che l'hotel è rumoroso farebbe bene a pensare ad una vacanza in un isola deserta invece di andare a New York ,
consigliato!!!!!

title: appartamentini funzionali e puliti
text: Soluzione ideale per chi deve fermarsi per un pò a new york o semplicemente vuole visitare la città e non vuole disporre di una semplice stanza di albergo ma piuttosto vivere il mood newyorkese, avendo a disposizione una quasi-casa...si tratta di piccolini appartamentini dotati di camera da letto, bagno, cucinino e saloncino con divano e tv. La location è centrale e a piedi si possono raggiungere vari punti attrattivi...e semplicemente si può respirare la città!

title: New York easy
text: Murray hill east suites was a great place to stay. Old fashioned but comfortable. We were five adults and were upgraded to the penthouse on the 15th floor. A large apartment with kitchenette and large balcony area. 10 minute walk from grand central station and Times Square. Such a good location for first timers. Would recommend this place as a good base for you New York adventures.

title: Tons of space for a family trip
text:
My family of 4 stayed here in October for a short weekend trip to NYC.  The location is great and the service is fantastic (especially the doormen, who were anxious to answer any/all questions and to help with the baby stroller down the stairs).  The hotel itself is rather old, with some serious updates needed in many places (they still use old-fashioned metal keys!).  It feels like it was designed as an apartment building, not a hotel...

However, if you have small children, the hotel's condition is worth overlooking, as the suites are ENORMOUS by NYC standards.  We booked an L-shaped suite and were upgraded to a one-bedroom.  The result was a room where we were able talk, watch TV and have a drink all while the kids were asleep in the other room.  As travelling parents can attest, this can be a rarity when hotel rooms are small.  It's a comfort not to be taken for granted....

title: Non pretencious, well located hotel
text:
Not to expensive and un pretencious suites hotel. The staff is very helpfull and always smiling.
It looks a little bit old, and could use a remodelation.
But its only 3 blocks away from Grand Station, very well located

title: очень удобно!
text:
останавливались в  Murray Hills дважды. Очень удобное расположение. Если Вы приехали в Нью-йорк походить по достопримечательностям, то это очень подходяще. Практически в центре - двадцать минут пешком и до рекфеллер центра и до Madison square garden и до Times square. 
Если Вы хотите отель в полном смысле этого слова, то Murray- это скорее сего на для Вас. Там именно комнаты или квартиры без всяких там отельных прибамбасов. У Вас своя кухня - и готовьте самостоятельно. особенное удобство для тех кто любит поесть дома - супермаркет буквально за углом, там есть все. Но вот в ларьках в округе - все по тройной цене. 
Так что приготовил завтрак сам и пошел по городу, а поужинать лучше в Oyster Bar на центральном вокзале. Потом десять минут пешком и дома.

Останавливались семьей с дочкой 8 лет. Так за ребенка плата отсутствовала! Можно себе такое представить в России? Как-то уж очень с трудом.

title: Great time had by all!!
text: Stayed here a couple of weeks ago with my husband and 2 adult kids. We booked a 2 bedroom suite. We were given a suite on the penthouse floor. We were so pleased, 2 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms plus a lounge area and an outside terrace, what more do you want. Alright the rooms are a bit dated but I didn't come to New York to admire the rooms. All the staff were very friendly and helpful. Great location near Grand Central and walking distance to other attractions. Would stay here again if we come back to New York.

title: Great location, good value, great service
text:
No two ways about it New York is relatively  expensive  so was great to find a good online price here. We mixed up our dates and could not extend our stay, but enjoyed the night we had.

Great service from front reception. A zealous doorman.  We lugged our suitcases form Penn Street Station (had misjudged  how far  it was)...fell in the door, he grabs the case for about 3 steps and wallah...a tip required!

Our room was excellent, very clean, nice & quiet. Comfortable bed. Tea and coffee making facilities. Reception was very accommodating holding our bags for the day whilst we went on a planned day trip.

title: Excellent Value for the price
text:
I stayed in the hotel suite with 3 more people. it was comfortable because of the large space.
Clean but pretty old hotel. Excellent location and very nice employees.
For the price we paid i believe it is excellent value!

title: Exelente ubicacion
text: Dos veces me hospede en murray hill me parece que es sencillo, cumple con las expectativas, es limpio hay servicio de mucama a diario. La atencion es correcta, solo hay una persona que habla español, el resto no hace ni el esfuerzo, pero vale la pena. A la vuelta hay un supermercado, muy comodo para todo!! Volveria sin dudas

title: Muy buena ubicación para moverse en Subte
text: La habitación era muy amplia y cómoda (102 en PB)Dormitorio con cama grande, livig con sillones y mesa, cocina completa (heladera, cocina de 4 hornallas, microondas,  cafetera, lavavajillas, tostadora) nos sirvió para el desayuno y las cenas y patio enorme!  En el subsuelo tiene un Laundry para lavar la ropa.Supermercado Dagostino a la vuelta, muy completo. Lo mas importante es que esta situado a 3 cuadras de de la Estación Gran Central, desde donde te podes mover en subte a todos los rincones de Nueva York. Le faltaria: que los recepcionistas sean un poco mas simpaticos y renovación de ropa blanca. Volveria sin lugar a dudas!!

title: Muy recomendable
text:
Nos recomendaron este Apart porque fuimos en familia y la verdad es que fue una muy buena elección. Ambientes espaciosos con todos los servicios. Muy buena ubicación para moverse caminando y en subterráneo ya que está a tres cuadras de la estación central. El personal cordial. Muy recomendable para ir en familia o con amigos ya que en un mismo lugar se pueden alojar varias personas siendo bastante más accesible.
Con seguridad volvería.

title: Opcion genial
text: Excelente opción! comodo, limpio, buena atención, excelente e inmejorable ubicación (si esto es lo que mas le importa ni lo dude) a 3 cuadras de Gran Central Station donde estan las lineas de metro. La unica falla que le encuentro es que el servicio de WIfi solo es gratuito en el lobby, en las habitaciones hay que pagar y esto me resulto muy incomodo. Por lo demas, volveria sin dudarlo.

title: clean old friendly staff
text: this hotel has old beds and poor in room air conditioning.i was on the 9th floor and if it were warmer than 60 f degrees at night it would have been really hot.  place reminded me more of a hostel.  very nice staff and decent location. relatively quiet. good breakfast spot across the street. no frills . popular with foreign tourists on a budget. i wouldnt stay here again.  250$ is not a lot in NYC.

title: Bem localizado e agradável
text: Hotel confortável, limpo, muito bem localizado. Fiz todos os passeios andando ou de metro (a estação Grand central fica uns 5 minutos andando, muito perto). Na Lexington av tem mercado logo de esquina, um excelente restaurante de massas House of Lasagna em frente, inclusive tem um garçom/gerente brasileiro, o Romulo, excelente pessoa. se forem lá mandem um abraço. Comi lá umas 4 vezes, kkkk. Enfim, o hotel é excelente: quarto espaçoso, limpo, com cozinha, cofre, banheiro bom, ar condicionado, TV LCD, tudo que vc precisa para descansar. Quem vai a nova York, não pode perder tempo dentro do hotel. Bom proveito.

title: Very large room, good location, and kitchen
text:
Booked for just one Saturday night.  Priceline express deal $266, this was on an expensive weekend and $266 was lowest price I found in the express deals.

The first surprise was, coming by taxi from LaGuardia, the hotel seemed to be on the street right after we exited the tunnel.

But the pleasant surprise was the size of the room.  Quite large, with a sofa / chair / sitting area, a small dining table, and of course the kitchen, which was stocked for actual cooking (pots/pans/knives, even a colander).  I figure I got the smallest room, since I booked via Priceline, so if this is any indication, the larger rooms must be quite large.

Bathroom and bed quite clean.  Disagree with other post about street noise not coming through.  The bed in my room was right by the windows and you could definitely here the noise outside.  I was on 6th floor.

There was an air conditioner which initially blew cold air but after a while, not so much.  At least it provided circulation and some fan noise.

All in all enjoyed it and will keep it in mind for future stays.

title: o.k.
text: I visited new york city with my wife at list once a year for more then 20 years and registerd at various hotels in various parts of mannhatten so i can compare. the location is excelent for east midtown trevelers who stay for few or more days in couple or more and don't want to eat out. a super d'agostino is few steps at 38st./ 3av. the staff is polite and willing. the furniture is old and used but well mantaind.during our stay a week ago, we didn't have hot water and a/c for more then 24 hours for some electric problem and later the hot water disapear for sconds during bath. so the years leave their "sign" on the place. cleaning is superficial as apparently it seemd clean but i found nuts and other garbage under the pillows of the coutch. the maid has forgotten to put paper towls in the kitchen and so in bath. not enough professional.  in this contest the the price is too high. but for "tolerant" people its o.k.

title: EXCELENTE ALTERNATIVA
text: Es un Apart Hotel que se encuentra muy bien ubicado, a tres cuadras de la Grand Central Station donde se puede tomar también los subtes. El hotel es muy agradable con cocina completa donde todos los días dejan café y té sin cargo, la habitación es cómoda y el baño también. Algo muy importante es que en la recepción siempre hay personas que hablan español lo que es una ventaja para quienes no dominan bien el ingles y atienden con total deferencia y buena predisposición para responder cualquier consulta. Lo único no totalmente satisfactorio es que para tener internet en la habitación se debe pagar y Wi Fi hay solo en el lobby que es pequeño por lo que siempre esta lleno de pasajeros con sus tablets, computadoras o teléfonos lo que no es cómodo para nada y creo que es algo que deben solucionar. Recomiendo el Murray Hill y en una nueva visita a Nueva York no dudaría en alojarme ahí.

title: Ottima posizione, camere pulite....ma niente di eccezionale
text: La posizione è ottima, la zona tranquilissima e la camera pulita e spaziosa pur non essendo bella, moquette per terra e doccia con tendina di plastica non sono proprio il massimo. Pur avendo la camera al secondo piano con affaccio su strada non ho avuto problemi di rumorosità.

title: Très bien situé
text:
Hôtel très bien situé pour visiter Manhattan.
Deuxième séjour dans cet hôtel et pas déçu même si cet hôtel n'est pas de première jeunesse.
Très grande chambre avec salon et cuisine.
Propreté irréprochable
Dommage qu'il n'y ai pas de petit déjeuner sur place mais il y a tout ce qu'il faut pas très loin

title: great place
text: The staff is very helpful and pleasant.The suites are spacious and comfortable.It makes for a very relaxing stay in New York City. The kitchen is very well equipped, surprising in my experience, for a hotel suite. So convenient to Grand Central too.

title: Hotel Excelente, localização muito boa.
text: Hotel excelente. Ficamos na cobertura com um apto lindamente decorado e super espaçoso, com quarto, sala dois ambientes, cozinha totalmente montada e banheiro com banheira, que no frio que estava fazendo, fez toda a diferença!  Sem falar da varanda super espaçosa com um visual lindíssimo de N.Y.  Atendimento cordial, próximo a tudo que desejar, desde restaurantes, atrações, salão de beleza e etc.... Adoro caminhar e essa localização, que por sinal excelente, me proporcionou a fazer quase tudo a pé: Grand Central Station, Times Square, 5th Avenue e etc,,,  do jeitinho que gosto! Vale lembrar que obtive essa sugestão através do Booking.com Viagens.

title: very good value for money
text: this hotel is excelently located in 39 st and the 3rd. walking distance from times square. suites are big, with a well eqipped kitchen, and are ideal for a family stay. a variety of restaurants and supermarkets nearby opens all options for dinning. enjoyed our stay.

title: Still great value and very comfortable
text:
I returned to this hotel after a 5 year absence, and was pleased to find that it has remained a rare affordable oasis in a pleasant yet convenient part of midtown.   The smallest suites are really suites, with a kitchenette that you can cook in, large closets (though limited hangers), and a spacious bedroom with eating table, desk, and sofa.  There is a supermarket around the corner on Third open till 10.  

Wifi is available to purchase for the room (I didn't test it) and free in the lobby.  There is HDTV with a fair number of cable channels (not sure about rental movies or connectivity).  Electronics are not this hotel's strong suit, however.

Where it shines is, first, quiet:  thick interior walls to muffle the neighbors, windows that face the street and even open, yet the rooms don't admit so much street noise that you can't sleep.  

And the decor, though plain and old fashioned, is clean and functional, with firm beds, and lamps and drawers and handles that work.   Similarly, the bathroom, though small and spartan, had functional plumbing and lots of counter space.

title: Above and over my expectations
text: I had never stayed in this part of New York and was worried I might not like it. Not only do I like the area, I also really like the hotel: the suits are spacious and pleasantly decorated. Impecably clean, the staff corteous .. what more can I say? Ah, and it is good value for money.

title: Departamentos muy cómodos, excelente zona.
text: Nos alojamos con la familia y buscabamos un appart, con cocina. Las habitaciones espaciosas. El baño correcto. La cama que agregaron el el living era realmente muy incómoda. La cocina completa y cómoda. La atención del personal muy cordial y amable. La zona de Murray Hill cerca de la estacion Grand Central excelente, cerca de todo, con supermercados cerca, el D ´agostino una maravilla, para tener en cuenta. No hay wi fi en las habitaciones. Nos sentimos muy cómodos, lo tenemos en cuenta para la próxima en New York.

title: Your Own Oasis in New York
text:
I discovered Murray Hill East Suites through one of the online companies that do not disclose the hotel until one buys, desperate for a hotel when all the published rates were nearly $400 and up even for two star hotels.  I was booked at Murray Hill.  My room was upgraded, so I am uncertain how other rooms are, but mine was great.  There is a living room-dining room and a bedroom bigger than many hotel rooms in New York.  The galley kitchen is as big as many apartment kitchens and fully equipped.  I really liked the fact that the kitchen is separated by a door from the rest of the suite.  I find many suites where everything is in one room which I do not care for.

There is  flat screen television in the bedroom and the living room.  The suite is nicely furnished and extraordinarily comfortable.  

The hotel is just three blocks from Grand Central Station, but it is on a quieter street with residences as well as commercial establishments.  One reviewer complained of the lack of restaurants, but a short walk of just a few blocks provides ample spots for eating.  And this is New York--a subway or a cab will quickly take you to a lifetime of restaurants.

Public areas are small, and the age of the hotel is visible.  I actually was given a metal key rather than a card (more like Europe) which was fine.  Service was great.  The desk staff was helpful, as was Paul who stored my bags while I was in town on business.

In short, Murray Hill was a present surprise and I would happily return.

title: OK hotel in good location
text:
This hotel was not our first choice but the only one still available within our budget due to the very busy Fashion Week/US Open. 

The location was good--only a few blocks from Grand Central Station, and with many different restaurants within a half mile radius. 

The hotel was OK. Our 4th story room looked out on East 39th Street, which was noisy during the weekdays because of buses and trucks as well as construction nearby, and quite noisy at night during the weekend. Loud revelers coming and going to and from the club/lounge next door all night kept us from getting a good night's sleep. 

The room was very clean, and the bed linens quite acceptable, but the mattress on the bed was old, creaky and saggy. Definitely not good for my back. Word to the management: it is high time to replace this mattress. The towels, while clean, were very thin and also in need of replacement. WiFi was an extra $9 per day in the room. The TV was nice and had cable with many channels.

The small kitchenette was very useful for cooking up some breakfast. Perhaps a sharp kitchen knife to cut up fruits or vegetables should be added to the utensils.

The staff was very nice and responsive. When I requested a fan (the AC alone could not handle the high heat and humidity when we were there), it was delivered within minutes. The elderly doorman was very friendly and helpful, as was the younger one, although the 20-something doorman could take some pointers on friendliness from the other two. A simple smile of acknowledgment makes a huge difference to guests.

Pros: very clean, friendly staff, good location
Cons: saggy old mattress, noisy room

title: Accommodation review and my tips for enjoying NYC!
text: A travelling companion and I stayed at Murray Hill East Suites for a week in June. This was my 'first time stay' at Murray Hills and I would perhaps stay at my other choice of accommodation but it wasn't possible this trip.  We love NYC - her first long time stay here and my 10th or more stay in this great city!  In looks, our apartment was "conservative to verging on  looking quite tired" in appearance.  There was a small kitchen with a fridge, dishwasher, cook top and oven and tableware and a small array of cooking necessities + a coffee maker.  Check in/out was efficient.  There are 2 lifts servicing the 14 floors + penthouse.  Staff were friendly and obliging.  We had a Junior Suite (room 903 which was clean and apart from NYC's usual police/ambulance/street sweepers-rubbish collectors noises, it was relatively quiet and our room overlooked E39th Street and a dry cleaners)  Bathroom was a combined bath/shower and toilet facility.  2 TV's (1 in the queen bed bedroom and 1 in the sitting/dining area)  There was a small round table + 3 chairs for dining and a pull-out bed/sofa (typical sofa bed comfort here!) In the basement, was a DIY laundry with washers/dryers (you could buy detergents but we bought our own as it worked out to be a cheaper alternative.  We had 5 weeks away from our homeland.) Surrounding our accommodation was an array of eateries/cafes and a great little bottle shop staffed by some wonderful people!  D'Agostinos  Market is closeby (bought cereals and milk etc for breakfasts but expensive !)  but check out other locations for your specific food etc needs. Best find for our eating needs  was the Every Day Café - a deli where you could purchase takeaway pre-made lunch and dinner selections at $7.99/lb and there was fruit/coffee/sandwich bar here too.  Or, try Delmarco Café (at 3rd and 41st Streets) where you can purchase premade food selection takeaways for 50% off (=$4.25/lb)between 4-7pm.  The Grand Central subway station was on Broadway and 42nd streets which was only a couple of blocks walk away from Murray Hills Suites - we bought a USD$30 7day unlimited subway pass - great value.  (Take the S train to Times Square station) For us, the subway is the choice of transportation to get around this mighty city!   Look out for street signs in brown colour - these indicate it is an historical area.  We enjoyed our Wednesday Harlem Gospel Tour.  They practise on a Wednesday - the main service is on a Sunday, of course.  We used a 3 day pass on the Grayline for our various sight seeing needs.  (Also included was a brief harbour cruise)  I enjoyed lots of the wonderful museums again and also the Museum of the City of New York.  So much to see and do in NYC - your choice of adventures - after years of visiting, I still haven't seen it all nor have I got tired of the experiences.  Apologies for this long winded review!!  :-)  Can't wait to get back to NYC!!!

title: ótimo
text:
O hotel é bastante confortável e o atendimento é excelente. Todos os recepcionistas são muito simpáticos e atenciosos.
E também é muito bem localizado, bem perto da Grand Central. 
A única ressalva é quanto ao secador de cabelo, bem antigo e pouco potente.

title: Vale la pena!
text:
Estuvimos una semana en Manhattan y valió la pena alojarnos en este apart hotel. Rentamos 2 cuartos, uno para los 5 niños y otro para nuestra pareja ubicado justo cruzando el pasillo. Las habitaciones son suficientemente espaciosas y con las comodidades lógicas (lavavajilla, cocina completa, microondas, tostadora, etc, etc.). El personal es muy amable. Está muy bien ubicado, la zona (Murray Hill) está en pleno midtown, a pocas cuadras de la estacion Grand Central (el metro) y por ello no demorabamos nada en llegar a cualquier sector de la isla.
Nos preparábamos el desayuno en la habitación con cosas que compramos en un mercado muy bien montado a media cuadra del hotel.
No es barato (unos 4000 U$S por ambos departamentos) pero valió cada centavo, teniendo en cuenta que estabamos "en medio" de Manhattan, lo que nos permitía volver al hotel en cualquier momento del día ("escalas técnicas") y salir nuevamente con otro destino.

title: Just average
text: This hotel room was spacious. Off the subway path. Clean rooms.  Neighborhood very residential. No good restuarants close by.  Would I stay here again? Probably not-due to location, not the hotel itself.

title: excellent
text:
Perfect location, well kept, suits families. All requests were met immediately by a very welcoming staff. We were able to use the kitchenette in a good manner and had easy access everywhere
